S06psp_6-8u:1_0: evam ukte āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:1_1: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhāvasvabhāvaiḥ sarvadharmaiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:1_2_0: tat kathaṃ bhagavann abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupūrvakriyā
S06psp_6-8u:2_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:2_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamam evaivaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:2_2_0: buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhadharmaparyupāsitānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2_2_1: pratyekabuddhānām vārhatāṃ vānāgāmināṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā srotaāpannānāṃ vābhāvatvād
S06psp_6-8u:2_2_2: buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhāvatvāt pratyekabuddhānām abhāvatvād arhatām abhāvatvād anāgāminām
S06psp_6-8u:2_2_3: abhāvatvāt sakṛdāgāminām abhāvatvāt srotaāpannānām abhāvatvāt sarvāryāṇāṃ nasti sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2_3: antaśo vālāgrakoṭīsthānamātrakam apīti tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_6-8u:2_4_0: abhāvā eva buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ pratyekabuddhā arhanto 'nāgāminaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:2_4_1: sakṛdāgāminaḥ srotaāpannāḥ sarvāryā yady ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye yadi vā nābhisaṃbhotsye
S06psp_6-8u:2_4_2: 'bhāvā eva sarvadharmāḥ yan nūnam aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:2_4_3: yām abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān bhāvasaṃjñāyāṃ carato 'bhāve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_6-8u:2_5: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃpratiṣṭhet sarvasattvānāṃ parinirvāṇārthāya so 'nupūrvakriyām ārabhetānupūrvaśikṣām (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:2_7: atra śikṣitvā pūrvakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhum,
S06psp_6-8u:2_8: prathamam eva ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣante yad uta dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_6-8u:3_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3_1: dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:3_2: sa tena dānena mahāntaṃ bhogaskandhaṃ pratilabhya dānaṃ dadāti vigatamatsareṇa cittena,
S06psp_6-8u:3_3_0: annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:3_3_1: śayanaṃ śayanārthikānām upāśrayam upāśrayārthikānāṃ pradīpaṃ pradīpārthikānām anyataram
S06psp_6-8u:3_3_2: api mānuṣyakaṃ pariṣkāropakaraṇaṃ dadāti sa tena dānena sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3_4: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3_5: sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena ca samanvāgataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:3_6_1: avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati
S06psp_6-8u:3_7: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:3_8: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati.
S06psp_6-8u:3_9: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānenānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:3_10: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya (PSP_6-8:3) hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:4_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:4_1: parāṃś ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati dāne pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye cānye śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:4_2: sa tena śīlena sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4_3: samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:4_4: sa tenaiva śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena ca vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena samanvāgatah.
S06psp_6-8u:4_5_1: avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati buddhakṣetraṃ
S06psp_6-8u:4_5_2: pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti sarvākārajñatām
S06psp_6-8u:4_5_3: anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu
S06psp_6-8u:4_5_4: pratiṣṭhāpayati sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati.
S06psp_6-8u:4_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlenānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:4_7: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:5_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:5_1: śīlaṃ ca rakṣati parāṃś ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati dāne śīle ca pratiṣṭhāpayati kṣāntipāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate.
S06psp_6-8u:5_2: ye cānye kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:5_3: sa tayā kṣāntyā sattvāñ śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:5_4: sa tena ca śīlaskandhena samādhiskandhena prajñāskandhena vimuktiskandhena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:5_5_1: atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ
S06psp_6-8u:5_5_2: pariśodhayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati sattvān paripācya
S06psp_6-8u:5_5_3: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:5_6: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:5_7: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpya saṃsārāt parimocayati.
S06psp_6-8u:5_8: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntyānupūrvakriyā prajñāyate 'nupūrvaśikṣānupūrvapratipat prajñāyate,
S06psp_6-8u:5_9: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:6_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:6_4: ye cānye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñah.

S06psp_6-8u:6_8: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,

S06psp_6-8u:6_13: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:7_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate,

S06psp_6-8u:7_8: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,

S06psp_6-8u:7_14: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:8_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāyātmanā ca
S06psp_6-8u:8_0_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate

S06psp_6-8u:8_4: ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.

S06psp_6-8u:8_17: tac ca sarvaṃ nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti.
S06psp_6-8u:9_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrvakriyāyāṃ śikṣate 'nupūrvaśikṣāyām anupūrvapratipadi sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya,
S06psp_6-8u:9_1: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān adhimucya buddhānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:9_3_0: śīlānusmṛtim bhāvayati, tyāgānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati, devatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati. kathaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:9_3_1: ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:9_3_2: mahāsattvaḥ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ na rūpato manasikaroti,
S06psp_6-8u:9_4: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato na vijñānato manasikaroti.
S06psp_6-8u:9_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpasvabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:9_6: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:9_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? asmṛtir amanasikārā buddhānusmṛtiḥ rūpādyamanasikāreṇa buddhānusmṛtyā.
S06psp_6-8u:9_9: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair manasikartavyo na suvarṇakāyo manasikartavyo (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:9_10: 7) na vyāmamātrayā prabhayā manasikartavyo nāśītyanuvyañjanair manasikartavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:9_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya svabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:9_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? asmṛtir amanasikārā buddhānusmṛtir lakṣaṇādyamanasikāreṇa buddhānusmṛtyā.

S06psp_6-8u:10_0_1: na samādhiskandhato na prajñāskandhato na vimuktiskandhato na vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhato
S06psp_6-8u:10_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:10_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? asmṛtir amanasikārā buddhānusmṛtiḥ śīlādiskandhāmanasikāreṇa buddhānusmṛtyā.

S06psp_6-8u:11_0_1: manasikartavyo na caturbhir vaiśāradyair na catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir manasikartavyo
S06psp_6-8u:11_0_2: na mahākaruṇayā na mahāmaitryā nāṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair manasikartavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:11_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:11_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? asmṛtir amanasikārā buddhānusmṛtir daśabalādyamanasikāreṇa buddhānusmṛtyā.
S06psp_6-8u:12_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na pratītyasamutpādato manasikartavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:12_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asya svabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:12_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? asmṛtir amanasikārā buddhānusmṛtiḥ pratītyasamutpādāmanasikāreṇa buddhānusmṛtyā.
S06psp_6-8u:12_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir manasikartavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:12_6: sa ihānupūrvakriyāyām anupūrvaśikṣāyām anupūrvapratipadi śikṣamāṇo 'nupūrvaprasthānaiś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:12_7: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ śūnyatāsamādhim ānimittasamādhim (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:12_11: mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayati, mahāmaitrīṃ paripūrayati, sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:12_12: abhāvasvabhāvayogena so 'bhāvasvabhāvāṃś caiva sarvadharmān abhisaṃbhotsyate yatra svabhāvasaṃjñāpi nāsti.

S06psp_6-8u:24_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:

S06psp_6-8u:30_1: anupalaṃbha eva prāptir anupalaṃbha evābhisamayo 'nupalaṃbha evānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,

S06psp_6-8u:37_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:37_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ekacittena ṣaṭprajñāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:37_2_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_6-8u:37_2_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny

S06psp_6-8u:37_2_3: pañcābhijñā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni

S06psp_6-8u:38_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yad dānaṃ dadāti tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:38_1: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati, yayā kṣāntyā saṃpādayati, yad vīryam ārabhate, yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati, tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:38_2: yad apramāṇaṃ samāpadyate, yā ārūpyasamāpattīḥ, yat smṛtyupasthānaṃ yaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:38_5: yān daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikān buddhadharmān yāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayati,

S06psp_6-8u:39_1_0: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekacittena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:40_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto yad dānaṃ dadāti tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:40_1: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati, yayā kṣāntyā saṃpādayati, yad vīryam ārabhate, yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:41_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati? evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:41_1: na ca dvayasaṃjñī bhavati, adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:41_2_0: na ca dvayasaṃjñī bhavati, evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:42_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:42_1: sa tatra dānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭpāramitā antargatāḥ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:42_2: yāvat sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān antargatāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti.
S06psp_6-8u:42_3_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:42_3_1: dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave citte sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti sa tatrānāsrave citte sthito
S06psp_6-8u:42_4: kasmai vā dadāmi? kiṃ vā dadāmi? kena vā dadāmi? sa nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:42_7: tac cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, taṃ pratigrāhakaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:43_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena śīlaṃ rakṣati,
S06psp_6-8u:43_2: tac cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:44_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:44_2: tac cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:45_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittopagatena cittena vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:45_2: tac cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:46_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:46_2: tac cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:47_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:47_1: sa tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayan na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:47_2: tac cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:48_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena
S06psp_6-8u:48_5: tac (PSP_6-8:18) cittaṃ na samanupaśyati, yāvat sarvabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:49_0_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann animittān abhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dānapāramitāparipūritā
S06psp_6-8u:49_1: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya paripūrir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:49_4: pañcānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:50_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:50_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:50_2_1: yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārān ādhyātmikāṃ bāhyāṃ vā bhāryāputraduhitṛrājyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:50_2_2: vālaṃkṛtya dānaṃ dadāti yācanakānān tasya kaścid evāgatyaivaṃ vadet:
S06psp_6-8u:50_3: kin te 'nena īdṛśena dānena dattenaivaṃ nirūpakāreṇa tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_5: kin te 'nena vā dānena vā dattenaivam āsphārikena dattenārthasya ca dātavyam evaṃ mayā dānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:50_6: na ca mayā na dātavyam. sa dānaṃ sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_7: sa tathā pariṇāmayati yathā pariṇāmayan nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_8: kiṃ vā dadāmi, kasmai vā dadāmi, ko vātra dadāti, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati kva vā parināmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:50_12: sa evaṃ paśyati ko vā pariṇāmayiṣyati kutra vā pariṇāmayiṣyati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_13: tasyaivaṃ pariṇāmayataḥ pariṇāmo bhavati nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_23: yathā caiva vipākañ ca na parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:50_24: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ manasaiva sarvopakaraṇāni bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:50_25: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manasaiva sarvopakaraṇaṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_26: sa tena dānena buddhāṃś ca bhagavata upatiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:50_27: sadevamānuṣāsurañ ca lokaṃ saṃtarpayati sa tān sattvāṃs tayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhyopāyakauśalyena triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:50_28: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:51_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:52_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tac chīlam āryam anāsravaṃ mārgaparyāpannaṃ dharmatāprātilaṃbhikaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:52_1: śīlaṃ pratilabhate, sa cāsya śīlaskandho 'khaṇḍo bhavaty acchidro 'śavalo 'kalmāṣo 'parāmṛṣṭo 'bhujiṣyaḥ susamātto vijñapraśastaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:52_2: tena ca śīlena kaṃcid dharmaṃ na parāmṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_3: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārāṃ vā vijñānaṃ vā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_0: 20) vāśītyanuvyañjanāni vā kṣatriyamahāśālakulaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulaṃ vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_1: vā cāturmahārājakāyikān vā devāṃs trayastriṃśān vā yāmān vā tuṣitān vā nirmāṇaratīn
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_2: vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapāriṣadyān vā brahmapurohitān vā mahābrahmāṇo
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_3: vā parīttābhān vā apramāṇābhān vā ābhāsvarābhān vā parīttaśubhān vā apramāṇaśubhān
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_4: vā śubhakṛtsṇān vā anabhrakān vā puṇyaprasavān vā bṛhatphalān vā asaṃjñisattvān vā
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_5: śuddhāvāsān vā aspṛhān vā atapān vā sudṛśān vā sudarśanān vā akaniṣṭhān vā ākāśānantyāyatanān
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_6: vā vijñānānantyāyatanān vā ākiñcanyāyatanān vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanān vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:52_4_7: vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā cakravartirājyādhipatyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:52_5: anyatra sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_8: tayā ca śīlapāramitayā paripūrṇayopāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāny utpādayaty anāsvādayogena divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_9: yena divyacakṣuṣā vipākajena ye pūrvasyān diśi lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:52_10: tān paśyati tac cāsya darśanaṃ ca na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_12: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyān diśy uttarasyān diśy ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:52_13: tān paśyati tasya darśanaṃ na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_15: sa divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:52_16: tac cāsya śrutaṃ tāvan na naśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_17: yāvan na tena śrutenātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:52_18: sa cetaḥparyāyajñānena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:52_19: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānenātītaṃ karma nirdiśati yena karmaṇākṛtena tat karma na vipraṇasyati,
S06psp_6-8u:52_26: evaṃ yatra yatra pratibalāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tatra tatra pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:52_27: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:53_0: subhūtir āha: katham animittānām anābhogānām anupalaṃbhamānānām apratibhānām anabhisaṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:54_0_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06psp_6-8u:54_0_1: yāvad bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā āgatya loṣṭadaṇḍaprahārān dahyus tatra bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:54_0_2: mahāsattvenaikacittasyāpi kṣobhasahagatasyāvakāśo na dātavyas tatra ca bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:54_1_0: katame dve yac ca sarvasattvānāṃ kṣāntavyam ākrośadaṇḍaloṣṭaprahārādiyā cāsyānutpattikeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:54_1_1: dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpādayitavyā tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākruśyamānena paribhāṣyamāṇena
S06psp_6-8u:54_1_2: loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadatām evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate
S06psp_6-8u:54_1_3: vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastrair vā prahārān dadāti tena dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo
S06psp_6-8u:54_1_4: dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṃś caiva nopalabhate kutaḥ punar dharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:54_3: ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmāṇāṃ dharmasvabhāvam anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:54_4: tatrānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kim iti kleśānutpattijñānānācchedyatā ca sa iha dvābhyāṃ kṣāntibhyāṃ yuktaś catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_5: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni caturarddhipādāni pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:54_6: 22) āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_7_0: sa iha dharmeṣu sthitvāryeṣv anāsraveṣu lokottareṣu sādhāraṇeṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
S06psp_6-8u:54_7_1: abhijñāḥ paripūrayati yābhir abhijñābhiḥ paripūritābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiś ca pāramitābhiḥ samudāgacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_8: sa ihābhijñāsu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:54_9: tasya sā buddhānusmṛtir nocchetsyati yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:54_10: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu yān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati tān dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:54_13_0: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣiṣyante
S06psp_6-8u:54_13_1: tat sarvam udgrahīṣyaty udgṛhṇaṃ tathatvāya sattvānāṃ dharman deśayiṣyati teṣāṃ ca
S06psp_6-8u:54_13_2: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyaty evaṃ sarvāryāṇāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:54_13_3: yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_14: sa tena cetaḥ paryāyajñānena sattvānāṃ cetasaiva caittam ājñāya tathatvāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_15: sa pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlam ājñāya tena pūrveṇa kuśalamūlena sattvān saṃdarśayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_16: sa āsravakṣayajñānena ca tān sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu niveśayiṣyati pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:54_17_0: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvāṃś
S06psp_6-8u:54_17_1: ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:54_17_2: paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:54_18: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:55_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:55_1: 23) carann ānimitteṣv anāsraveṣv anābhogeṣv anupalaṃbheṣv apratibhāseṣu vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:56_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_1: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_3: yāvac candrasūryau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato yena daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:56_4_0: anekaśatasahasreṣu lokadhātuṣv ṛddhyā gatvā tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais
S06psp_6-8u:56_4_1: tasya te cīvarapiṇḍapātrās tāvan na kṣīyante yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate
S06psp_6-8u:56_5: cīvarapiṇḍapātreṇa parinirvṛtasya ca śarīre pūjā pravartate,
S06psp_6-8u:56_6: tenaiva carddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa gatvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:56_7: sa na jātu vipraṇasyati, yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:56_8: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_9: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:56_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:56_11_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:56_11_1: mārgāṅgena mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:56_11_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato 'kuśalasya kāyikakarmaṇo
S06psp_6-8u:56_11_3: 'vakāśaṃ na dadāty akuśalasya vākkarmaṇo 'kuśalasya manaskarmaṇo 'vakāśaṃ na dadāti
S06psp_6-8u:56_11_4: na parāmṛśati nityam iti vā anityam iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vātmeti vānātmeti
S06psp_6-8u:56_11_5: vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam iti vā kāmadhātum iti vā rūpadhātum iti vārūpyadhātuṃ
S06psp_6-8u:56_12: prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ caturthaṃ vā dhyānaṃ maitrīṃ vā karuṇāṃ vā muditāṃ vopekṣāṃ vākāśānantyāyatanaṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:56_13: 24) va vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ vākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:56_14: smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni varddhipādāṃ vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni vāryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ vā mārgaṃ śūnyatāṃ vānimittaṃ vāpraṇihitaṃ vāryasatyāni vābhijñā vā vimokṣān
S06psp_6-8u:56_15_0: vā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vā samādhīn vā dhāraṇīmukhāni vā tathāgatabalāni vā
S06psp_6-8u:56_15_1: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vāveṇikān vā buddhadharmān na parāmṛśati nityānityasukhaduḥkhātmānātmaśāntāśānta
S06psp_6-8u:56_16_0: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekāṃ vā bodhim
S06psp_6-8u:56_16_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ srotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vānāgāminaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:56_16_2: pratyekabuddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā buddhaṃ vā bhagavantaṃ na parāmṛśatīme sattvā
S06psp_6-8u:56_18: ime ūrddhabhāgikaprabhāvitā ime sarvajñatāprabhāvitā ime mārgajñatāprabhāvitā ime sarvākārajñatāprabhāvitā ity evam api na parāmṛśati.
S06psp_6-8u:56_19: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:56_21: sa tena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato maraṇasukhe 'pi vartamānaḥ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_27: sa tena kāyikena caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgatas tān kuśalān dharmān parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:56_28: tatra ca na sajjate, so 'sajjamāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_29: lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmati sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:56_30: sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan yena yenarddhiprātihāryeṇecchati vikurvituṃ tena tenarddhiprātihāryeṇa vikurvati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_31_0: yadi vā puṣpavarṣeṇa yadi vā gandhapramuñcanena yadi vā gītābharaṇena yadi vā bhūcalanena
S06psp_6-8u:56_31_1: yadi vā saptaratnamayair lokadhātusaṃdarśanena yadi vā jyotiratnānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa
S06psp_6-8u:56_31_2: ātmānam avasṛjati yadi vā gandham avasṛjati yadi vā mahāyajñam avasṛjati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_35: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārān mṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanād avaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ parimocayati,
S06psp_6-8u:56_36: kāṃścid dānenānugṛhṇāti, kāṃścic chīlena keṣāṃcit kṛtaśo 'ṅgapratyaṅgaṃ parityajati
S06psp_6-8u:56_39: evaṃ yena yenopāyena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:56_41: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:57_0: subhūtir āha: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:58_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sthāpayitvā tathāgatasamādhiṃ sarvasamādhīn paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_1_0: sa viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sa vitarkaṃ sa vicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:58_1_1: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:58_2: maitrīsahagatena cittena karuṇāsahagatena muditāsahagatenopekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantam lokadhātum upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_3: ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_4: sa tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvāṣṭavimokṣān anulomapratilomān upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_10: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vajropamaṃ ca samādhim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_14_0: 26) kṛtvā śuklavidarśanā bhūmim atikramya gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:58_14_1: vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvibhūmiṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam
S06psp_6-8u:58_15: buddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayati, sa āsu ca bhūmiṣu carati, na cāntarā samādhiphalaṃ prāpnoti,
S06psp_6-8u:58_17: so 'tra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_18: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsamānaḥ sa tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike kuśalamūlam avaropayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_20: sattvān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścic chīlena saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścit kṣāntyā saṃgṛhṇāti kāṃścid vīryeṇa saṃgṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:58_21: kāṃścid dhyānena saṃgṛhṇāti, kāṃścit prajñayā saṃgṛhṇāti, kāṃścid vimuktyā kāṃścid vimuktijñānadarśanena kāṃścit srotāapattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_22: kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale kāṃścid arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_23: kāṃścit pratyekabodhau kāṃścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_24: yair yaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sattvā udgacchanti tatra tān sattvān niyojayati sa iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasamādhimukhāny abhinirharati catasraś ca pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:58_25: pratilabhate vipākajānāñ cābhijñānām lābhī bhavati sa na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:58_26: na jātu kāmān pratisevate na sā kācid upapattir yāṃ na gṛhṇāti na cotpattir doṣair lipyate.
S06psp_6-8u:58_27: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena māyopamā sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ supratibuddhā bhavanti sa māyopamaṃ sarvasaṃskāragataṃ viditvā mahākaruṇā pratigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:58_28: na ca tatra sattvān sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:58_29_0: sa sattvān sattvaprajñaptim anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anupalaṃbha eva sattvān
S06psp_6-8u:58_29_1: pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāram upādāya na ca punaḥ paramārthena iha dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:58_29_2: sthitvā sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu carati na jātu dhyānapāramitayā virahito
S06psp_6-8u:58_31: (PSP_6-8:27) sa iha sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:58_34: sa ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ kurvan sadevamānuṣāsuralokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavāti.
S06psp_6-8u:58_35: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:58_36: iti dānādīnām anyatamena sarvānāsravaikalakṣaṇasaṃgrahalakṣaṇo 'yam ekacittakṣaṇābhisamayaḥ prathamaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:59_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāpripūrim gacchati?
S06psp_6-8u:60_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmaṃ sadbhūtaṃ vā pariniṣpannaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_2: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāsadbhūtatām apariniṣpannatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_4: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_5: sa rūpasyotpādam asamanupaśyan vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ na samanupaśyan rūpasyāyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_7: evaṃ yāvat sarvasāsravānāṃ dharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āyadvāraṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_9: evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpasya svabhāvan nopalabhate yāvat sarvasāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvan nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:60_10: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān adhimucate,
S06psp_6-8u:60_11: sa evam adhimucyādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na keṣu kācid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate,
S06psp_6-8u:60_12_0: rūpe vā vedanāyāṃ vā saṃjñāyāṃ vā saṃskāreṣu vā vijñāne vā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:60_12_1: vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā pāramitāsu vā śūnyatāsu vā bodhipakṣyeṣu vā dharmeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:60_15_0: yad uta ṣaṭpāramitā yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:60_16_0: sa vipākajadharme bodhisattvamārge sthitvā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripūrṇāsu yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:60_16_1: dharmeṣu paripūrṇesu yāvad vipākajāsu pañcasv abhijñāsu sthitvā ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:60_17: ye śīlena ye samādhinā ye prajñayā ye vimuktyā ye vimuktijñānadarśanenānugrahītavyās tāṃs tair anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:60_18_0: ye srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ye sakṛdāgāmiphale ye 'nāgāmiphale ye 'rhattve
S06psp_6-8u:60_18_1: ye pratyekabodhau ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:60_19: evaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ so 'nekavidhām ṛddhiṃ kurvāṇo gaṅgānadīvālukopamām lokadhātūn na gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_20: sa ākāṅkṣaṃs tāṃ lokadhātūn yādṛśai ratnair
S06psp_6-8u:60_21: ākāṃkṣati tādṛśai ratnair abhinirmiṇoti sa sattvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayaṃ lokadhātūn saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_22: sa tāṃ lokadhātūn dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:60_24: ye 'py anye lokadhātavo 'pagatapāpiṣṭhā evaṃ vidhās tenopabhogaparibhogāḥ syur iti,
S06psp_6-8u:60_25_0: sa tayā vipākajayā dānapāramitayā śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā
S06psp_6-8u:60_25_1: dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā vipākajābhir abhijñābhir vipākajena bodhisattvamārgeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:60_25_2: mārgajñatāyāṃ caran sarvapāramitāḥ prāptaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:60_26: yāvat sarvañ caiva rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apagṛhītaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:60_27: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ kuśalā vākuśalā vā laukikā vā lokottarā vā sāsravā vānāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:60_28: 29) 'parigṛhītaṃ, tasmāt tarhi subhūte tasyānuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'parigṛhītaḥ sarvopabhogo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:60_29: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmā aparigṛhltā anupalaṃbhayogena.
S06psp_6-8u:60_30: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimittayogena prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:61_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:61_1: kathaṃ bhagavann evam asaṃbhinneṣu dharmeṣv ānimitteṣu lakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanāparipūrir bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:61_2: dānapāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ katham eṣāṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:61_5: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:61_6: kathaṃ bhagavann evam alakṣaṇeṣu dharmeṣv ekalakṣaṇeṣu yad utālakṣaṇeṣu nānākaraṇaṃ prabhāvyate.
S06psp_6-8u:62_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:62_1_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:62_1_1: pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu pratibiṃbhopameṣu marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:62_1_2: gandharvanagaropameṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:62_1_3: rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānāni samāpadyate prajñāṃ bhāvayati
S06psp_6-8u:62_1_4: svapnopamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān jānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān
S06psp_6-8u:62_1_5: marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca pañcaskandhān alakṣaṇān
S06psp_6-8u:62_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi svapnaṃ tasya kaścit svabhāvo na hi pratiśrutkāyā na hi pratibhāsasya na hi pratibiṃbasya na hi marīcyā na hi māyāyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:62_3: na hi nirmitakasya na hi gandharvanagarasya kaścit svabhāvo (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:62_4: 30) yasya svabhāvo nāsti tasya nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:62_5: yasya ca nāsti lakṣaṇaṃ sa ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:62_6: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam alakṣaṇaṃ dānam alakṣaṇo dāyako 'lakṣaṇaḥ pratigrāhako 'lakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:62_7: evaṃ jñātvā dānaṃ dadāti sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:62_8: sa dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayan śīlapāramitāyāṃ na vivartate,
S06psp_6-8u:62_13: sa āsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:62_22_0: iha vipākajeṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu sthitvā daśasu dikṣu ye lokadhātavas tān ṛddhyā
S06psp_6-8u:62_22_1: gatvā buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste tāṃś copatiṣṭhati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyasarvopakaraṇapariṣkārair
S06psp_6-8u:62_23_0: ye dānena saṃgrahītavyās tān dānena saṃgṛhṇāti ye śīleṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye kṣāntyā
S06psp_6-8u:62_23_1: saṃgrahītavyā ye vīryeṇa saṃgrahītavyā ye dhyānena saṃgrahītavyā ye prajñayā saṃgrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:62_24_0: yāvad ye sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgrahītavyās tān sarvān kuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti
S06psp_6-8u:62_24_1: kuśalair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃsāraṃ copādadāti na ca saṃsārāvacarair duṣkhair
S06psp_6-8u:62_24_2: lipyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo devamānuṣikīñ ca saṃpattim utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:62_26: so 'lakṣaṇān sarvasattvāṃ jñātvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_6-8u:62_27: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:62_28: 31) tiṣṭhati, anāgāmiphalaṃ ca jānāti na ca tatra tiṣṭhati,
