S06psp_6-8u:65_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:66_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catasṛbhiḥ kṣāntibhiḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:66_2_0: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyātrāntare sarvasattvā ākrośeyur vā paribhāṣeran vāsatyayā
S06psp_6-8u:66_2_1: vācā paruṣayā vā samudācareyur loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadyus tatra bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:66_3: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:66_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte 'syālakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:66_5: sarvadharmāḥ kṣamanti tat kiṃ asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:66_6: ko me ākrośati vā paribhāṣate vāsatyayā vācā paruṣayā vā samudācarati loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti sa evam upaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:66_7: so 'nayā kṣāntipāramitayā paripūrṇayānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate.
S06psp_6-8u:67_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:67_1: kaiṣā bhagavann anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ kiṃ vā etasyāḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ vā jñānam?
S06psp_6-8u:68_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:68_1: aṇavo 'pi subhūte 'kuśalā dharmā notpadyante tenocyante 'nutpattikā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:68_2: tatra yā kṣāntis tad ucyate jñānaṃ yena jñānenānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:69_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:69_1: yā ca bhagavan śrāvakānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ vānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir yā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir āsāṃ kṣāntīnāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:70_0: bhagavān āha: yac ca subhūte srotaāpannasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:70_1: yac ca sakṛdāgāmino jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:70_2: yac cānāgāmināṃ jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:70_3: yac cārhato jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:70_4: yac ca pratyekabuddhasya jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:70_5: idaṃ subhūte nānākaraṇaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kṣānter bodhisattvakṣānteś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:70_6_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ihaivaṃ rūpayā kṣāntyā samanvāgataḥ
S06psp_6-8u:70_6_1: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān abhibhavati vipākajāyām anutpattikāyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:70_7: yayā paripūrṇayāvirahito bhavati saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiś ca samādhibhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:70_8: sa iha pañcabhir abhijñābhir avirahito bhavati so 'virahitatvād ābhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:70_9: sattvāṃś ca paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
S06psp_6-8u:70_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:71_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūtr bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:71_0_2: māyopameṣu nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:72_0: subhūtir āha: kathañ ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:73_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyikaṃ ca caitasikaṃ ca vīryam ārabhate sa kāyikena vīryeṇa ṛddhim abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:73_1: (PSP_6-8:35) daśadiglokadhātuṃ gatvā buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:73_2: sa tena kāyikena vīryeṇa sattvān pāripācayati triṣu yāneṣu niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne 'nuttare buddhayāne.
S06psp_6-8u:73_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann alakṣaṇāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:73_4: sa caitasikena vīryeṇānāsraveṇa mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:73_5_0: yatra paryāpannāḥ sarvakuśalā dharmās tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
S06psp_6-8u:73_5_1: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ trīṇi
S06psp_6-8u:73_5_2: vimokṣamukhāni catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭavimokṣā
S06psp_6-8u:73_5_3: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś catvāri satyāni pañcābhijñāḥ samādhiḥ dhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:73_5_4: daśa bodhisattvabhūmayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_6-8u:73_6_0: yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā yasyāṃ paripūrṇāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:73_7_0: lakṣaṇapariniṣpattiṃ paripūrya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran samantaprabhatām ārāgayiṣyati
S06psp_6-8u:73_7_1: samantaprabhatām ārāgya dharmacakraṃ ca pravartayiṣyati dvādaśākāran triparivartasya
S06psp_6-8u:73_7_2: pravartatena trisāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampiṣyate saṃprakampiṣyate pravedhiṣyate
S06psp_6-8u:73_9: sarve ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsena sphāriṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:73_10_0: tasya punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śabdo niścariṣyati tatra ye trisāhasre
S06psp_6-8u:73_10_1: mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās taṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyanti te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttareṣu
S06psp_6-8u:73_11_0: evaṃ bahuprakārā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā yasyāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:73_11_1: sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:74_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:74_1: 36) nirmitakopameṣu gandharvanagaropameṣu ca pañcasūpadānaskandheṣu sthitvālakṣaṇeṣu dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_6-8u:75_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lakṣaṇeṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_6-8u:76_0_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:76_0_1: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati
S06psp_6-8u:76_0_2: maitrīkaruṇāṃ muditām upekṣām ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanan
S06psp_6-8u:76_0_4: vidyutopamañ ca samādhiṃ bhāvayati vajropamañ ca samādhiṃ bhāvayati yatra samādhau
S06psp_6-8u:76_1: śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā ye 'py anye samādhigaṇās tān sarvān kāyena saṃspṛśyopasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:76_3_0: na ca samāpattiphalam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān samādhīn
S06psp_6-8u:76_3_1: alakṣaṇān jānāty abhāvasvabhāvatvāt tat kim alakṣaṇo dharmo 'lakṣaṇaṃ dharmam āsvādayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:76_5: so 'nāsvādayan na kasyacit samāpatter vaśenopapatsyate kāmadhātau vā rūpadhātau vārūpyadhātau vā.
S06psp_6-8u:76_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tān dhātūn nopalabhate yo 'pi samāpadyeta yena vā samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:76_7: tam api nopalabhate 'nupalaṃbhamāno 'lakṣaṇāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati sa tayā dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:77_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:77_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitayā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:78_0_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito
S06psp_6-8u:78_0_2: na ceha śūnyatāsu kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrāvatiṣṭhet,
S06psp_6-8u:78_1: srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vānāgāmiphale vārhattve vā pratyekabuddhatve vā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vā sāpi śūnyā śūnyatayā,
S06psp_6-8u:79_0: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmaḥ? katamo niyāmaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:80_0: bhagavān āha: sarvaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopalaṃbha ātmaḥ sarvānupalaṃbho niyāmaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:81_0: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavann upalaṃbhaḥ? katamo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:82_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:82_2: cakṣur upalaṃbhaḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana upalaṃbho,
S06psp_6-8u:82_6: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:82_8: avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhāvo jātir jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:82_9_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
S06psp_6-8u:82_11: ayam ucyate āmaḥ, niyāmaḥ punaḥ subhūte yatraiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravyāhāro nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:82_12_0: rūpasya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
S06psp_6-8u:82_12_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
S06psp_6-8u:82_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte rūpasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:82_14: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:82_15: 38) sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvabodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:82_16_1: so 'pravyāhāraḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pravyāhāro daśānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:82_20: niyāmam akrānto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhiparipūrṇo na samāpattivaśenopapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:82_21_0: prāg eva rāgaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā mohaṃ votpādayed yatra sthitvā tat karmābhisaṃskuryād
S06psp_6-8u:82_21_1: yena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa caturṇāṃ dhyānānām anyatamenopapadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate
S06psp_6-8u:82_21_2: 'nyatra māyopameṣu sthitvā sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti na ca sattvānupalabhamānaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:82_21_3: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:82_22: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:83_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopamān
S06psp_6-8u:83_0_1: dharmān parijānāti pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān
S06psp_6-8u:84_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:84_1_0: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnopamān sarvadharmān parijānāti?
S06psp_6-8u:84_1_1: pratiśrutkopamān pratibhāsopamān pratibiṃbopamān marīcyupamān māyopamān nirmitakopamān
S06psp_6-8u:85_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na svapnaṃ na svapnadarśinaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_5: na māyāṃ na (PSP_6-8:39) māyādarśinaṃ, na nirmitakaṃ na nirmitakadarśinaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:85_6: na gandharvanagaraṃ na gandharvanagaradarśinaṃ ca paśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:85_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi viparyāsaḥ svapno viparyāsaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:85_8_0: pratiśrutkā viparyāsaḥ pratibhāso viparyāsaḥ pratibiṃbaṃ viparyāso marīcir viparyāso
S06psp_6-8u:85_8_1: māyā viparyāso nirmitako viparyāso gandharvanagaraṃ viparyāsa eṣa bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:85_8_2: punar nāpi svapnadarśanaṃ nāpi svapnadarśī na pratiśrutkādarśanaṃ nāpi pratiśrutkādarśī
S06psp_6-8u:85_14: evaṃ yāvan nārhan na pratyekabuddho na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:85_15_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā asadbhūtā ye 'bhāvasvabhāvāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:85_15_1: sarvadharmās te pariniṣpannās tatra kiṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:85_15_2: caran bhāvasaṃjñī bhaviṣyati pariniṣpannasaṃjñī vāsadbhūtasaṃjñī vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:85_16: tat kasya hetoḥ? na sā prajñāpāramitā syād yadi kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo bhavet pariniṣpattir vā sadbhūtatā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:85_17: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na rūpe sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_18: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_21: na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātau sajjati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_25: āryasatyeṣu na sajjati, dānapāramitāyāṃ na sajjati, śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:85_26: na sajjati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_28: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tāṃ bhūmiṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:85_29: tat kiṃ tatra cchandarāgaṃ kariṣyaty evaṃ dvitīyāṃ bhūmiṃ tṛtīyāṃ bhūmiñ caturthāṃ bhūmiṃ pañcamīṃ bhūmiṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:85_30: 40) ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ saptamīṃ bhūmim aṣṭamīṃ bhūmiṃ navamīṃ bhūmiṃ daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_32: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tā bhūmīr nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:85_34: evaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau caran sarvadharmāś ca tatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:85_36: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarvadharmāḥ sā ca prajñāpāramitādvayādvaidhīkārāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:85_37: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścid bhedo 'sti dharmadhātunirdeśena tathatānirdeśena bhūtakoṭinirdeśenāsaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:86_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:86_1: yadi bhagavānn asaṃbhinnatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tatra kathaṃ kuśaladharmanirdeśo bhavati sāsravāṇām anāsravāṇāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:86_2: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:87_0_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā kasyacid dharmasya
S06psp_6-8u:87_0_1: pravyāhāraḥ saṃskṛtasya vāsaṃskṛtasya vā srotaāpattiphalasya vā sakṛdāgāmiphalasya
S06psp_6-8u:87_0_2: vānāgāmiphalasya vārhattvasya vā pratyekabodher vā bodhisattvatāyā vā samyaksaṃbodher
S06psp_6-8u:89_0: bhagavān āha: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:89_1: asaṃbhinnāḥ sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā anutpannā avinirbhogāḥ sarvadharmā na mayā subhūte sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā,
S06psp_6-8u:89_2: kaścid dharmopalabdho rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā saṃjñeti vā saṃskārā iti vā vijñānam iti vā skandhadhātvāyatanānīti vā pratītyasamutpannā iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:89_3: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vārūpyadhātur vā,
S06psp_6-8u:89_4_0: kuśalākuśalā vā dharmāḥ sāsravā vānāsravā vā sāvadyā vānavadyā vā saṃskṛtam iti vāsaṃskṛtam
S06psp_6-8u:89_4_1: iti vā yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:89_4_2: pratyekabodhir vā bodhisattvatā vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā.
S06psp_6-8u:89_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbotsyate 'nupalaṃbhayogena,
S06psp_6-8u:89_6: evaṃ caratā (PSP_6-8:41) subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāve kuśalena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:89_8: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati, buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:89_9: yatra sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān vinayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:89_10: ye vinītatvās triṣu bhaveṣu na dṛśyante,
S06psp_6-8u:89_11: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam alakṣaṇayogena.
S06psp_6-8u:90_0: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām ekakṣaṇābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāparisamāptiparivartaḥ saptamaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:92_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣām eva svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:92_0_1: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ sarvākārapariśuddhānām anāśravāṇāṃ yā prakṛtir ekalakṣaṇā yad
S06psp_6-8u:92_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:93_0: subhūtir āha: katame punas te bhagavann anāsravāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:94_0_0: bhagavān āha: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāry apramāṇāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
S06psp_6-8u:94_0_1: daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni aṣṭāv abhinnāyatanāni araṇasamādhiḥ praṇidhijñānam ṣaḍ abhijñāś
S06psp_6-8u:94_0_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayo daśa pāramiā daśabalāni catvāri
S06psp_6-8u:94_0_3: vaiśāradyāni trīṇy akṣarāṇi trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamudghāto
S06psp_6-8u:94_0_4: mahākaruṇā sarvākārajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā ca ime ucyante subhūte anāsravāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:94_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāip śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:95_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva dharmāṇām adhigamād anuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:95_0_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair
S06psp_6-8u:95_0_2: aśītyā cānuvyañjanair alaṃkṛtakāyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:95_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:96_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā teṣām eva sarvadharmāṇām avigamenānuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:96_0_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho daśasu dikṣv anantāparyanteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:96_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:97_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:97_1: kathaṃ bhagavan svapnopamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:97_2: ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotraāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartante,
S06psp_6-8u:97_8_2: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānam ime kuśalā ime 'kuśalā ime laukikā ime lokottarā
S06psp_6-8u:97_8_3: ime sāsravā ime 'nāsravā ime saṃskṛtā ime 'saṃskṛtā ime srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai
S06psp_6-8u:98_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:98_1: iha subhūte bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ svapnam upalabhate svapnadarśinam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:98_13: kāyena vācā manasā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyān abhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti.
S06psp_6-8u:98_14: kāyena vācā manasā tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dvayoḥ śūnyatayoḥ sthitvātyantaśunyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyāñ ca sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_15_0: śūnyam idaṃ traidhātukaṃ nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:98_15_1: vā skandhā vā dhātavo vāyatanāni vā pratiśrutkaiṣā pratibhāsa eṣa marīcir eṣā nirmitaka
S06psp_6-8u:98_15_2: eṣa gandharvanagaram etan nāsty atra rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:98_15_3: vā skandhadhātavo vāyatanāni vā nāsty atra svapno na svapnasya draṣṭā,
S06psp_6-8u:98_20: na māyāṃ na māyāyā draṣṭā, na nirmitako na nirmitakasya draṣṭā,
S06psp_6-8u:98_22: 'pi tu sarva ete dharmā avastukā abhāvasvabhāvās tatra bhavanto 'skandhe skandhasaṃjñinaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:98_24: api tu khalu punaḥ pratītyasamutpannā ete sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitāḥ karmavipākaparigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:98_25: kiṃ punar yūyam avastukeṣu dharmeṣu vastusaṃjñām utpādayathaivaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye matsariṇaḥ sattvās tān mātsaryān nivartayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_27: teṣāñ ca sa dānaparityāgo mahābhogatāyai saṃvartate,
S06psp_6-8u:98_28: niyojayati, teṣāṃ sa śīlasamādānajaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ svargopapattaye bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_29: sa tāṃs tata uccālya samādhau niyojayati sa teṣāṃ samāpattijaḥ puṇyaskandho brahmalokopapāttaye bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_30_0: evaṃ prathamād dhyānād dvitīye dhyāne dvitīyād dhyānāt tṛtīye dhyāne tṛtīyād dhyānāc
S06psp_6-8u:98_30_1: caturthe dhyāne caturthād dhyānād ūrdhvam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattāv
S06psp_6-8u:98_31: sa tasmād api dānād dānaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:98_33: sa tasmāc chīlāc chīlaphalāc cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_34: sa tebhyo dhyānebhyo dhyānaphalebhyaś ca samāpattibhyaḥ samāpattiphalebhyaś cānekaparyāyaṃ vivecyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_35_0: evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv
S06psp_6-8u:98_35_1: indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅgikamārge triṣu vimokṣamukheṣv
S06psp_6-8u:98_35_2: aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu
S06psp_6-8u:98_35_3: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu niveśayati
S06psp_6-8u:98_36: sa ebhir anāsravair dharmair arūpibhir anidarśanair apratighair ye srotraāpattiphale sthāsyanti tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_37: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthāsyanti tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_40: ye pratyekabodhau sthāsyanti tān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:98_42: teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhimārgam ākhyāti upadiśati samuttejayati,
S06psp_6-8u:99_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavanatam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:99_1: āścaryam etat bhagavann adbhuto dharmo yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:99_2: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇām atyantaśūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:99_3_0: ime kuśalā dharmā ime 'kuśalā dharmā ime laukikā dharmā ime lokottarā dharmā ime
S06psp_6-8u:99_3_1: sāsravā dharmā ime 'nāsravā dharmā ime sāvadyā dharmā ime 'navadyā dharmā ime saṃskṛtā
S06psp_6-8u:100_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:100_1_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat āścaryam idaṃ subhūte paramāścaryam idaṃ bodhisattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:100_1_1: mahāsattvasyādbhuto dharmo yad iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:100_2: sacet tvaṃ subhūte jānīyā yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhuto dharmas (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:100_3_0: 47) taṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api ca evam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na
S06psp_6-8u:100_3_1: sukaraḥ pratikāraḥ kartuṃ tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvair bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śakyaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:101_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:101_1: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāścaryādbhūto dharmo yo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyate?
S06psp_6-8u:102_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhuś ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te,
S06psp_6-8u:102_1: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīd,
S06psp_6-8u:102_2_0: bhagavān etad avocat: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:102_2_1: vipākajāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā pañcasv abhijñāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:102_2_2: dhāraṇīmukheṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu sthitvā daśadiglokadhātuṣu ye sattvā dānenānugrahītavyās
S06psp_6-8u:102_3: ye śīlena ye kṣāntyā ye vīryeṇa ye dhyānena ye prajñayā ye prathamena dhyānena ye dvitīyena dhyānena ye tṛtīyena dhyānena ye caturthena dhyānena,
S06psp_6-8u:102_4: ye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattyā ye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattyā ye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattyānugrahītavyās tān anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:102_5: ye maitryānugrahītavyā ye karuṇayā ye muditayā ye upekṣayā ye caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:102_7: ye caturbhiḥ ṛddhipādaiḥ, ye pañcabhir indriyaiḥ, ye pañcabhir balaiḥ, ye saptabhir bodhyaṅgair ye āryāṣṭāṅgikena mārgeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:102_8: ye śūnyatayā ye ānimittena ye 'praṇihitena samādhinānugrahītavyās tān śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir anugṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:103_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:104_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāty annam annārthikebhyo dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:104_1: pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāśayanāsanaṃ yāvad anyatarānyataraṃ mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkāraṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:104_2_0: yathaiva (PSP_6-8:48) tathāgatayārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya dadāti tathāiva pratyekabuddhebhyo
S06psp_6-8u:104_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anānātvaṃ sarvadharmaṃ jñātvā anānātvaṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:104_4: anānātvaṃ dānaṃ datvā anānātvasya dharmasya lābhī bhavati yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:104_5: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:104_6: samyaksaṃbuddhā me dakṣiṇīyā na tiryagyonigatā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:104_7_0: na bodhisattvadharmo bhavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_6-8u:104_7_1: bodhāya cittam utpādyaivam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthita ime mayā sattvā
S06psp_6-8u:104_7_2: dānenānugrahītavyā ime mayā sattvā dānenānugrahītavyā iti cintayati,
S06psp_6-8u:104_11: tenaiva ca dānānugraheṇa tribhir yānair anupariśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:104_12: saced ete bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ janapadabalakāyā avadhyāyeran tena nānyathācittam utpādayitavyaṃ dāsyāmi vā na vā,
S06psp_6-8u:104_13: api tu akopitamānasena janapadabalakāyebhyo dānaṃ dātavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:104_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya janapadabalakāyasyārthāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:104_15_0: evaṃ ca punar vikalpayed garhyo bhaveyaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:104_15_1: mahāsattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām arhatāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurasya ca lokasya
S06psp_6-8u:104_15_2: kenāyam adhīṣṭaḥ sarvasattvānām ahaṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmi parāyaṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇam
S06psp_6-8u:105_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā manuṣyabhūtā vāmanuṣyabhūtā vāgatyāṅgapratyaṅgāni yāceran,
S06psp_6-8u:105_2: dāsyāmi vā na dāsyāmi vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānām arthāya sañcintya āśrayaḥ parigṛhīto 'nena mayātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:105_3: tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yeṣām arthe mayātmabhāva upāttas te 'yācitakam eva gṛhītvā gacchantu.
S06psp_6-8u:105_4: evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:49) subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:105_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ete dharmā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā na hi śūnyatā kasmaicid dadāti vā cchinatti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:105_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:105_7: yad utādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ satatasamitam.
S06psp_6-8u:105_8: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S06psp_6-8u:105_9: evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ, ko veha dānan dadāti, kasmai vādīyate, kiṃ vādīyate, tasyaivaṃ dadato dānapāramitāyāṃ paripūrir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:105_10: so 'nayā dānapāramitayā paripūryā vā hy adhyātmikeṣu dharmeṣu cchidyamāneṣu evaṃ cittam utpādayiṣyati ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā.
S06psp_6-8u:106_0_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte paśyāmi buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:106_0_1: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃcintya mahānirayaṃ patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny
S06psp_6-8u:106_0_2: upaśāmya tribhiḥ prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta
S06psp_6-8u:106_3: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti.
S06psp_6-8u:106_4: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike cittam atiprasādya tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti,
S06psp_6-8u:106_5: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāyānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:106_6_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu lokadhatuṣu
S06psp_6-8u:106_6_1: buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān
S06psp_6-8u:106_6_2: mahāsattvān sañcintya mahāniraye patitvā tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny upaśāmya tribhiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:106_6_3: prātihāryais teṣāṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayato yad uta ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa
S06psp_6-8u:106_7: 50) vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa ca tāni mahānirayaduḥkhāny upaśāmya ādeśanāprātihāryeṇa dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:106_8: anuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā mahāmuditayā mahopekṣayā ca dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:106_9_0: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike cittam abhiprasādya
S06psp_6-8u:106_9_1: tebhyo nirayebhyo vyuttiṣṭhanti tebhyo nirayebhyo vyutthāyānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair
S06psp_6-8u:107_0_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:107_0_1: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakāṃs tat te bodhisattvā
S06psp_6-8u:107_0_2: mahāsattvās tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti manaāpanapriyeṇa nāpriyeṇa gauraveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:107_0_3: nāgauraveṇa yañ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_6-8u:107_1: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā udgṛhṇanty udgṛhya dhārayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:107_2: na ca jātu vipraṇāśayati yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06psp_6-8u:107_3: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisāttvān mahāsattvān buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakāṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:107_4: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti manaāpenapriyeṇa nāpriyeṇa gauraveṇa nāgauraveṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:107_5: yaṃ ca te budhhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_6-8u:107_6: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā udgṛhṇanty udgṛhya dhārayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:107_7: na ca jātu vipraṇāśayanti yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_6-8u:108_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte lokaṃ vyavalokayan buddhacakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06psp_6-8u:108_0_1: paśyāmi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiryagyonigatānāṃ sattvānām arthāyātmaparityāgaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:108_1: tat te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā daśasu dikṣu kṣipanti,
S06psp_6-8u:108_2: ye tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvās tesāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māṃsāni bhakṣayanti te teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike maitrīṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_6-8u:108_3: te tena maitrīpratilābhena tatas tiryagyoner vyuttiṣṭhanti tiryagyoner vyutthāya buddhāṃ bhagavata (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:108_4: 51) ārāgayanti, te tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti,
S06psp_6-8u:108_5: te teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇonti,
S06psp_6-8u:108_7: te 'nupūrveṇānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_6-8u:108_8: evaṃ bahukarāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti cittam utpādya tathatvāya pratipadyante,
S06psp_6-8u:108_9: te 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānair anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti,
S06psp_6-8u:108_10: śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā.
S06psp_6-8u:109_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte lokaṃ vyavalokayan buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:109_1: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ye pretaviṣayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pretaviṣayaṃ duḥkhaṃ tat sarvaṃ pratiprasraṃ bhayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:109_2_0: ye pretaviṣayeṣu sattvās te duḥkhavedanā prasrabdhakāyās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
S06psp_6-8u:109_2_1: antike maitrīcittam utpādyate na kuśalamūlena tataḥ pretayāner vyuttiṣṭhanti vyutthitāś
S06psp_6-8u:109_2_2: ca tena kuśalamūlena tataḥ pretayāne buddhair bhagavadbhir na jātu virahitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:109_4_0: te tān buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:109_4_2: tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā.
S06psp_6-8u:109_5: evaṃ karuṇā vihāriṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānām arthāya pratyupasthitā yad uta parinirvāṇāya.
S06psp_6-8u:110_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:110_1_0: trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ dharmaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:110_1_1: deśayanti te ca devaputrās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antikād dharmaṃ śrutvānupūrveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:110_1_2: triṣu yāneṣu parinivṛtāś ca parinirvānti ca (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:110_2_0: 52) parinirvāsyanti ca, tatra subhūte ye devaputrā audārikaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇair
S06psp_6-8u:110_2_1: mūrchitās teṣāṃ tāni vimānāny ādīpya dharmaṃ deśayanty anityāḥ khalu mārṣāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:111_0_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte 'nāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan paśyāmi daśasu dikṣv
S06psp_6-8u:111_0_1: ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ye brahmadṛṣṭim
S06psp_6-8u:111_1: kathaṃ bho mārṣāḥ śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭim utpādayatha,
S06psp_6-8u:111_2: evaṃ rikteṣu tuccheṣu sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭim utpādayatha.
S06psp_6-8u:111_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā karuṇāyāṃ sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti.
S06psp_6-8u:111_4: āścaryam idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām adbhuto dharmaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:112_0_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte paśyāmi buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06psp_6-8u:112_0_1: lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ye manuṣyāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇanti,
S06psp_6-8u:112_1: dānena priyavadyatayā, arthakriyayā samānārthatayā, kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:112_2: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvābhyāṃ dānābhyāṃ sattvān anugṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:112_3: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? yad utāmiṣapradānena ca dharmadānena ca.
S06psp_6-8u:112_4_0: kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva āmiṣapradānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti? iha subhūte
S06psp_6-8u:112_4_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā śaṅkhaśilāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:112_4_2: vā pravāḍaṃ vā rajataṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vānnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā yānaṃ vā vastuṃ vā gandhaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:112_4_3: vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā śayanaṃ vā āsanaṃ vā pratiśrayaṃ vā pradīpaṃ vā striyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:112_4_4: vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vāśvaṃ vā gāṃ vā anaḍvāhaṃ vā hastinaṃ vā ajāvikaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:112_4_5: vā dhānyādīni vā ātmamāṃsaṃ vā dātuśabdam anuśrāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_5: āgacchadhvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣāḥ, yena yena yuṣmākaṃ kāryaṃ tat tat mamāntikān nirviśaṅkā gṛhītvā gacchata.
S06psp_6-8u:112_6: yena yena kṛtyaṃ (PSP_6-8:53) yuṣmadīyam evedaṃ tad dānaṃ datvā buddhaśaraṇaṃ gamayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_7: dharmaśaraṇaṃ gamayati, saṃghaśaraṇaṃ gamayati, kāṃścit pañca śikṣāpadāni grāhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_10_0: kāṃścit prathame dhyāne, kāṃścid dvitīye, kāṃścit tṛtīye, kāṃścic caturthe dhyāne,
S06psp_6-8u:112_10_1: kāṃścid ākāśānantyāyatane, kāṃścid vijñānānantyāyatane, kāṃścid ākiñcanyāyatane,
S06psp_6-8u:112_11: kāṃścid maitryāṃ, kāṃścit karuṇāyāṃ, kāṃścid muditāyāṃ, kāṃścid upekṣāyāṃ samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_12_0: kāṃścid buddhānusmṛtyāṃ, kāṃścid dharmānusmṛtyāṃ, kāṃścit saṃghānusmṛtyāṃ, kāṃścic
S06psp_6-8u:112_12_1: chīlānusmṛtyāṃ, kāṃścit tyāgānusmṛtyāṃ, kāṃścid devānusmṛtyāṃ, kāṃścid aśubhaparivarteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:112_19: kāṃścid aṣṭaṣu vimokṣeṣu, kāṃcin navasu anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:112_20: kāṃścic caturṣv āryasatyeṣu, kāṃścid daśeṣu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_27: kāṃścic chrotaāpattiphale, kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale, kāṃścid anāgāmiphale, kāṃścid arhattve, kāṃścit pratyekaboddhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_29: kāṃścid dānapāramitāyāṃ, kāṃścic chīlapāramitāyāṃ, kāṃścit kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ, kāṃścid vīryapāramitāyāṃ, kāṃścid dhyānapāramitāyāṃ, kāṃścit prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:112_33: kāṃścid adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ, kāṃścid bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ, kāṃścid adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyām,
S06psp_6-8u:112_35: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyeṇa sattvānām āmiṣadānaṃ datvā dāne yogakṣeme mārge pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:113_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān dharmadānenānugṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:113_0_1: ime subhūte dharmadāne katame dve laukikaṃ ca lokottaraṃ ca? katamac ca subhūte laukikaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:113_0_2: dharmadānaṃ yā laukikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarve kṣaṇā deśanā prakāśanā vivaraṇottānīkaraṇatā,
S06psp_6-8u:113_1: tad yathāśubhaparivartakasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:113_2: ye 'py anye kecid laukikādharmāḥ sā dhāraṇā bālapṛthagjanair idam ucyate laukikāṃ dharmadānam.
S06psp_6-8u:113_3: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:113_4: idaṃ laukikaṃ dharmadānaṃ datvā anekaparyāyeṇānekavidhenopāyena tataḥ samādānād vivecayati sa vivecyopāyakauśalyenāryeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:113_5: āryadharmāṇāñ ca phale, katame ca te āryadharmāḥ? katamad āryadharmāṇāṃ phalaṃ? āryadharmā ucyante subhūte saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:113_6: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni, catvāry āryasatyāny, āryadharmāṇāṃ phalaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:114_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāryadharmā yat srotaāpattiphale jñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:114_1: yat sakṛdāgāmiphale jñānaṃ, yad anāgāmiphale jñānaṃ, yad arhattve jñānaṃ, yat pratyekabodhau jñānaṃ, yat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu jñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:114_4: yad abhijñāsu jñānaṃ, yad daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu jñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:114_5: yad mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ mahāmuditāyāṃ mahopekṣāyāṃ jñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:114_6: yat sarvapāramitāsu jñānaṃ, yat sarvaśūnyatāsu jñānam, ime ucyante bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāryadharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:114_7: ye 'pi cānye laukikā vā lokottarā vā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:114_8: sāsravā vā anāsravā vā saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:115_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasyāryadharmāṇāṃ phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:116_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:116_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpayati?
S06psp_6-8u:117_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:118_0: subhūtir āha: nāsti tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatasya ca nānākaraṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:121_0: bhagavān āha: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:121_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy anyad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:121_3: nānyat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya yatra sthitvā sarvadharmāṇām anānākaraṇatām anuprāptāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:121_4: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ dharmadānaṃ yad upaniśrayo bhavati lokottarasya dharmadānasya.
S06psp_6-8u:121_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvāl lokottaradharmadāne niyojyopāyakauśalyena yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:122_0: katamac ca subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ lokottaradharmadānam? yad asādhāraṇaṃ sarvabālapṛthagjanais tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_6-8u:122_1_0: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāni, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_6-8u:122_1_1: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś, catvāry apramāṇāni, trayaḥ samādhayaś, catvāry āryasatyāny, aṣṭau
S06psp_6-8u:122_2_0: daśa kṛtsnāny, aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāny, araṇā, praṇidhijñānaṃ, ṣaḍ abhijñāś, catasraḥ
S06psp_6-8u:122_2_1: pratisaṃvidaḥ, sarvākārāś, (PSP_6-8:56) catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ, daśa vaśitā, daśa
S06psp_6-8u:122_2_2: balāni, catvari vaiśāradyāni, trīṇi rakṣāṇi, trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni, asaṃmoṣadharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:122_3: aśīty anuvyañjanāni, idam ucyate lokottaradharmadānaṃ na laukikam.
S06psp_6-8u:123_0: katamāni ca subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? adhyātmakāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:123_3: ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye samudayānupaśyī ca kāyasya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:123_5: kāyānupaśyī ca viharati, aniścitaś ca viharati, na ca kañcil loke upādatte, evaṃ vedanāyāṃ citte 'dhyātmadharme dharmānupaśyī viharati bahirdhādharme dharmānupaśyī viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:123_7: ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye samudayānupaśyī ca dharmāṇāṃ viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:123_10: aniścitaś ca viharati, na ca kañcil loke upādatte, imāny ucyante catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni.
S06psp_6-8u:124_0: katamāni ca subhūte catvāri samyakprahāṇāni? anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandañ janayati,
S06psp_6-8u:124_2: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandañ janayati,
S06psp_6-8u:124_3: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhūyobhāvāya chandañ janayati,
S06psp_6-8u:125_0: katame ca subhūte catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ? chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaś cittavīryamīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:126_0: kamāni ca subhūte pañcendriyāni? śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:127_0: katamāni ca subhūte pañca balāni? śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam,
S06psp_6-8u:128_0_0: katamāni ca subhūte sapta bodhyaṅgāni? smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:129_0: katamaś ca subhūte āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ? samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:130_0: katamāni ca subhūte catvāry apramāṇāni? maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāḥ, imāny ucyante catvāry apramāṇāni.
S06psp_6-8u:131_0: katame ca subhūte trayas samādhayaḥ? śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitās samādhayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:131_1: katamaś ca śūnyatāsamādhir yā śūnyatākāreṇa viviktākāreṇa tucchākāreṇa riktākāreṇa niḥsvabhāvasaṃskāreṇa ca cittasyaikāgratāyam ucyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:131_2: katamaś cānimittaḥ samādhir yā śāntākāreṇa viviktākāreṇa ca cittasyaikāgratā,
S06psp_6-8u:131_4: katamaś cāpraṇihitaḥ samādhir yānityākāreṇa duḥkhākāreṇa viparyāsākāreṇa ca cittasyaikāgratā,
S06psp_6-8u:132_0: katamāni ca subhūte catvāry āryasatyāni? duṣkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga imāny ucyante catvāry āryasatyāni.
S06psp_6-8u:133_0: katame ca subhūte aṣṭau vimokṣā? rūpī rūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:133_1: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñāṃ bahirddhārūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:133_2: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharaty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:133_3: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṅgamāṃ nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_6-8u:133_4: ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_6-8u:133_5: vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramān nāsti kiṃ canety ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_6-8u:134_0_0: katamāś ca subhūte navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ? ihaikebhyo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:134_0_1: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:134_1: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmasaṃprasādāc caitasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_6-8u:134_3: smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhañ ca kāyena prativedayate,
S06psp_6-8u:134_4: yat tadārya ācakṣate, upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_6-8u:134_5: sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvām eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhañ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_6-8u:134_6: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:135_0: katamāni ca subhūte daśa kṛtsnāni? pṛthivīkṛtsnam apkṛtsnan tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ nīlakṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnam avadātakṛtsnaṃ vijñānakṛtsnam ākāśakṛtsnam,
S06psp_6-8u:136_0: katamāni ca subhūte aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni? adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,
S06psp_6-8u:136_1: tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati tathā saṃjñī bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:136_2: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyati mahadgatāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,
S06psp_6-8u:136_3: tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:136_12: uṣasi tārakāyā varṇaiḥ saṃpannaṃ vārāṇaseyakaṃ vastram.
S06psp_6-8u:137_0: katamā ca subhūte araṇā? dhyānaṃ niśritya parakleśānutpatter anurakṣāvihārasusamṛddho yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tat saṃpramuktāś ca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:138_0: katamac ca subhūte praṇidhijñānam? dhyānaṃ niśritya idaṃ jānīyām iti praṇidhānasamṛddho yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tat saṃprayuktāś ca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:139_0: katamāś ca subhūte ṣaḍ abhijñā? ṛddhyabhijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:140_0_0: katamāś ca subhūte catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ? dhyānaṃ niśritya paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe
S06psp_6-8u:140_0_1: janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhedeṣv avyāghātasamṛddho yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tat saṃprayuktāś
S06psp_6-8u:141_0: katamāś ca subhūte sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ? āśayapariśuddhir ālambanapariśuddhiś cittapariśuddhir jñānapariśuddhiś cemā ucyante sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:142_0: katamāś ca subhūte daśa vaśitāḥ? āyurvaśitā,
S06psp_6-8u:143_0: katamāni ca subhūte daśa tathāgatabalāni? sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:143_4: 60) prajānāti, parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ nānādhimuktikatāṃ yathābhūtāṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:143_7: divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena yāvat sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante ye sattvās tān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:143_9: ekāṃ vā jātiṃ jātiśataṃ vā jātisahasraṃ vā jātiśatasahasraṃ vā jātikoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā yāvat pūrvāntakoṭiśo yāvat sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ sanidānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:144_0: katamāni ca subhūte catvāri vaiśāradyāni? samyaksaṃbuddhasya ca me pratijānata ime dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ity atra me kaścit sadevake loke samārake,
S06psp_6-8u:144_1: sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vā dharmā kopayed iti nimittam evaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:144_2: evaṃ vāhan nimittam asamanupaśyaṃ kṣamaprāpto 'bhayaprāpto viharāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:144_4: śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vānyena kenacid vā punar loke 'smin sahadharmeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:144_5_0: kṣīṇāsravasya ca me pratijānata ime 'nāsravā dharmā aparikṣīṇā ity atra me kaścid
S06psp_6-8u:144_5_1: yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmi yā mayā śrāvakānāṃ pratipad ākhyātā āryā nairyāṇikī
S06psp_6-8u:144_5_2: samyag duḥkhakṣayāya tāṃ pratiṣedhamāno na niryāyāt,
S06psp_6-8u:144_6: samyag duḥkhakṣayāyeti, sthānam etan na samanupaśyāmi yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:144_7: ye vā mayā śrāvakebhya āntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātās te pratiṣedhamāṇā nālam anterāyāyeti me kaścid yāvad dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmīmāny ucyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni.
S06psp_6-8u:145_0: katamāni ca subhūte trīṇy ārakṣāṇi? pariśuddhaṃ kāyakarma pariśuddhaṃ vākkarma pariśuddhaṃ manaskarmetīmāny ucyante trīṇy ārakṣāṇi.
S06psp_6-8u:146_0_0: katamāni ca subhūte trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni? śrotukāmeṣv aśrotukāmeṣv ubhayakāmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:147_0: katamā ca subhūte 'saṃmoṣadharmatā? sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu sadopasthitasmṛtitā,
S06psp_6-8u:148_0: katamaś ca subhūte vāsanāsamudghātaḥ? sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ kleśasaṃgāv asadṛśaceṣṭo 'samudācāro 'yam ucyate vāsanāsamudghātaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:149_0: katamā ca subhūte mahākaruṇā? yā sarvakālaṃ sarvasattveṣu niruttarā hitasukhādhyāśayateyam ucyate mahākaruṇā.
