S06psp_6-8u:185_2: sarvā vedanā sarvā saṃjñā sarve saṃskārāḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:186_0: bhagavān āha: sarvaṃ subhūte rūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ sarvā vedanā sarvā saṃjñā sarve saṃskārāḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:187_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puruṣakāro bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:187_1: yadi sarvaṃ rūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ sarvā vedanā sarvā saṃjñā sarve saṃskārāḥ sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ nirmitasya ca na bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:187_2: rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro yataḥ saṃsārāt sattvān parimocayet.
S06psp_6-8u:188_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu bodhisattvena (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:188_1: 76) mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ boodhisttvacaryāṃ caratā kaścit sattva upalabdho yaṃ narakād vā mocayet tiryagyoner vā yamalokād vā manuṣyebhyo vā devebhyo vā.
S06psp_6-8u:190_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kaścit sattva upalabdho yaṃ traidhātukāt parimocayet.
S06psp_6-8u:190_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā dṛṣṭā viditā bhavantīty ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:191_0_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā
S06psp_6-8u:191_0_1: dṛṣṭā viditāḥ kasyārthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carati caturṣu
S06psp_6-8u:191_0_2: dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:191_0_3: dharmeṣu bodhimārge ca buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
S06psp_6-8u:192_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:192_1_0: yadi subhūte sattvāḥ svayam eva nirmitopamān sarvadharmān jānīyur na bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:192_1_1: mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān sattvānām arthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ cared yasmāt tarhi
S06psp_6-8u:192_1_2: subhūte sattvāḥ svayam eva nirmitopamān sarvadharmān na jānanti.
S06psp_6-8u:192_2: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:193_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:193_1: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamāḥ kutra bhagavan pratiṣṭhitāḥ sattvāḥ yato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāyāṃ carann uccālayati?
S06psp_6-8u:194_0: bhagavān āha: nāmanimitte subhūte sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitā asatparikalpitatām upādāya,
S06psp_6-8u:194_1: tato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nāmanimittād uccālayati.
S06psp_6-8u:195_0: atha khalv āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamad bhagavan nāma kataman nimittam?
S06psp_6-8u:196_0: bhagavān āha: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ yad uta nāmanimittam iti kṛtrimam etan nāmadheyaṃ yad uta nāmanimittam iti,
S06psp_6-8u:196_1: yad uta rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā strī vā puruṣo (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:196_2_0: 77) vā dārako vā dārikā vā nairayiko vā tairyagyoniko vā yamalaukiko vā devo vā manuṣyo
S06psp_6-8u:196_2_1: vā saṃskṛto vā dharmo vāsaṃskṛto vā dharmaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:196_2_2: vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vānuttarasamyaksaṃbuddho vā.
S06psp_6-8u:196_3: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte prakṛtidharmaḥ sarvan nāmārthena śūnyaṃ nāmamātram etat sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ tatra bālapṛthagjanāḥ saktās tān,
S06psp_6-8u:196_4: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān vivecayati parikalpayati parikalpasamutthitam etan nāmadheyaṃ mā yūyam asatparikalpe sajjate,
S06psp_6-8u:196_5: asati vastūni svabhāvaśūnye na hi śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu paṇḍitā abhiniviśante.
S06psp_6-8u:196_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:196_7: katamat subhūte nimittaṃ dva ime subhūte yatra bālapṛthagjanāḥ saktāḥ? katame dve? rūpanimittañ cārūpanimittañ ca.
S06psp_6-8u:196_8_0: katamac ca subhūte rūpanimittaṃ? yat kiñcit subhūte rūpam audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā
S06psp_6-8u:196_8_1: praṇītaṃ vā madhyaṃ vādhimātraṃ vā tatra kṣaṇikeṣu dharmeṣu yat parikalpagrahaṇam
S06psp_6-8u:196_9: katamac cārūpanimitttaṃ? yāni kānicid rūpāṇi dharmā vānimittagrāhiṇaḥ parikalpāḥ kleśañ janayantīdam ucyate,
S06psp_6-8u:196_10_0: arūpanimittaṃ yatra bālapṛthagjanān saktān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:196_10_1: carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān nimittato vivecyānimitte dhātau niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06psp_6-8u:196_11: yathā na dvayaṃ patantīdaṃ nimittam idam animittam.
S06psp_6-8u:196_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān nimittato vivecyānimitte dhātau niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:197_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:197_1: yadi bhagavann etatparamā ete sarvadharmā yad uta nāmanimittaparamāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:197_2: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca viśeṣaṃ gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:197_3: kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu parāṃś ca viśeṣādhigame niveśayati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu yaiḥ kuśalair dharmair bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:198_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:198_1_0: sacet subhūte vastv abhaviṣyan nāvastunimittan na subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:198_1_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viśeṣam adhyagamiṣyan na ca parāṃś ca viśeṣe nyayokṣyad yataḥ
S06psp_6-8u:198_1_2: khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty
S06psp_6-8u:198_6: dhyānāni paripūrayaty ānimittayoganāpramāṇāni paripūrayaty ānimittayogenārūpyasamāpattīḥ paripūrayaty ānimittayogena,
S06psp_6-8u:198_9: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayaty ānimittayogena,
S06psp_6-8u:198_10: sa imān kuśalān dharmān paripūrya parān api kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojayaty ānimittayogena,
S06psp_6-8u:198_11: sacet subhūte dharmanimittam abhaviṣyad anāsraveṣu sarvadharmeṣu naiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām artham akariṣyad yataḥ subhūte anāsravāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:198_12: ānimittā asmṛtayo 'manasikārās tasmāt khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:199_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:199_1_0: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā ānimittā asmṛtayo 'manasikārās tat kuto bhagavān gaṇanāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:199_1_1: karoti? ime sāsravā dharmā ime anāśravā dharmā ime sādhāraṇā dharmā ime 'sādhāraṇā
S06psp_6-8u:199_1_2: dharmā ime laukikā dharmā ime lokottarā dharmā ime sāvadyā dharmā ime 'navadyā dharmā
S06psp_6-8u:199_1_3: ime saṃskṛtā dharmā ime 'saṃskṛtā dharmā ime śrāvakadharmā ime pratyekabuddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:200_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:200_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte anyad ānimittam anye śrāvakadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:202_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'nyad ānimittam anye pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:204_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'nyad ānimittam anye bodhisattvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:206_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'nyad ānimittam anye buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:208_0_0: bhagavān āha: tad anenāpi te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam ānimittā asmṛtayo 'manasikārāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:208_0_1: sarvadharmā ity atra hi subhūte śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalair dharmair
S06psp_6-8u:208_0_2: vivardhate yad uta ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiś caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir
S06psp_6-8u:208_0_3: ārūpyasamāpattibhiś caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhi
S06psp_6-8u:208_0_4: ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgamārgeṇādhyātmaśūnyatayā
S06psp_6-8u:208_0_6: abhijñābhir aṣṭabhir vimokṣair navabhir anupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ sarvasamādhibhiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:208_1_1: svalakṣaṇaśūnyaṃ sa eṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:208_2: aṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu śikṣate, caturṣv āryasatyeṣu śikṣate, dvādaśāṅge pratītyasamutpāde śikṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:208_3: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:208_5: 80) śikṣate, daśasu pāramitāsu śikṣate, daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu śikṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:208_8: pañcasv abhijñāsu śikṣate, daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu śikṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:209_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:209_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu śikṣate?
S06psp_6-8u:210_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:211_0: kathaṃ rūpaṃ prajānāti? atyantacchidrataś cātyantānṛtataś ca tadyathāpi nāma phenapiṇḍo 'sāraḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:211_1: evaṃ rūpaṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ rūpasyotpādavyayau prajānāti? nāpi rūpaṃ kutaścid āgacchati nāpi rūpaṃ kvacid gacchati kutaścid āgamanato na kvacid gamanataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:211_3: kathaṃ rūpasya tathatāṃ prajānāti? na tathatotpadyate na nirudhyate nāgacchati na gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:211_5: na hānir na vṛddhir evaṃ tathatāṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:211_6: api tu khalu subhūte tathataiva sā yasmāt tathatety ucyate,
S06psp_6-8u:212_0: kathaṃ vedanāṃ prajānāti? tadyathāpi nāmodakabudbudā riktakā utpadyante vā nirudhyante vā,
S06psp_6-8u:212_1: evaṃ vedanāṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ vedanāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti? na sā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchaty evaṃ vedanāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti.
S06psp_6-8u:212_2: kathaṃ vedanāyās tathatāṃ prajānāti? sāpi tathatā avitathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:213_0: kathaṃ saṃjñāṃ prajānāti? tadyathāpi nāma marīcyām udakam atyantatayā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:213_1: evaṃ saṃjñāṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ saṃjñāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti? na sā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchaty evaṃ saṃjñāyā utpādavyayau prajānāti.
S06psp_6-8u:213_5: kathaṃ saṃskārān prajānāti? tadyathāpi nāma kadalyāṃ sāram atyantatayā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:213_6: evaṃ saṃskārān prajānāti. kathaṃ saṃskārāṇām utpādavyayau prajānāti? na te kutaścid āgacchanti na kvacic gacchanty evaṃ saṃskārāṇām utpādavyayau prajānāti.
S06psp_6-8u:213_7: kathaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatāṃ prajānāti? sāpi tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:214_0: kathaṃ vijñānaṃ prajānāti? tadyathāpi nāma māyākāranirmitaś caturaṅgo balakāya evaṃ vijñānaṃ prajānāti.
S06psp_6-8u:215_0: kathaṃ vijñānasyotpādavyayau prajānāti? na tat kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:215_2: kathaṃ vijñānasya tathatāṃ prajānāti? sāpi tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,
S06psp_6-8u:216_0: kathaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ prajānāti? rūpāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanasvabhāvena śūnyam,
S06psp_6-8u:217_0: kathaṃ rūpadhātuṃ prajānāti? rūpadhātū rūpadhātusvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:217_15: vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātusvabhāvena śūnyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:217_16: avidyāvidyāsvabhāvena śunyā. evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpam ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ bhavo jātir,
S06psp_6-8u:218_0: katham āyatanāni prajānāti? adhyātmikā dharmā adhyātmikair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:218_3: āryasatyaṃ prajānāti, dvayato vinirmuktam āryasatyaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_6-8u:218_5: evaṃ samudayam evaṃ nirodham evaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadam.
S06psp_6-8u:219_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:219_1: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evaṃ parasparavibhinnān prajānāti tadā na nu bhagavan dharmadhātur vikopito bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:220_0: bhagavān āha: vikopitaḥ subhūte dharmadhātuḥ syād yadi dharmadhātur vinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ syān,
S06psp_6-8u:220_1: na subhūte dharmadhātur vinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:220_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa vā dharmadhātur vinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharmā upalabdhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:220_4: anupalabhya na prajñāpayati dhātuvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharma uplabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:220_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmadhātau śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:221_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:221_1: dharmadhātau bhagavan śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kiṃ śikṣitaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:222_0: bhagavān aha: dharmadhātau śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:222_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarvadharmā dharmadhātuḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:223_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvadharmā dharmadhātuḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:224_0: bhagavān āha: asaṃskṛto dhātur evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena dharmadhātau śikṣitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_6-8u:225_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:225_1_0: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā dharmadhātus tat kiṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_1_1: śikṣitavyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_1_2: śikṣitavyaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam? kiṃ bodhisattvena
S06psp_6-8u:225_1_3: mahāsattvena prathamadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ dvitīyadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ tṛtīyadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_1_4: caturthadhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ maitryāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ karuṇāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ muditāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
S06psp_6-8u:225_2_0: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhau śikṣitavyaṃ? kiṃ sarvaśūnyatāsu śikṣitavyaṃ vimokṣamukhasamādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_6-8u:225_2_3: ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu śikṣitavyaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapariniṣpattaye śikṣitavyam
S06psp_6-8u:225_2_6: cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapattaye śikṣitavyaṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_2_7: yāmānāṃ tuṣitānān nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ brahmapārṣadyānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_2_8: mahābrahmāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_3: 84) anabhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ śuddhāvāsānām aspṛhāṇām atapānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ sudarśanānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapattaye śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:225_4: na ca tatropapattaye śikṣitavyam ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanānām ākiñcanyāyatanānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānām upapattaye śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_6: dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame ṣaṣṭe saptame 'ṣṭame navame kiṃ daśame cittotpāde śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_7: kiṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā bodhisattvabhūmau vā sattvaparipāke vā buddhakṣetrapariśodhane vā dhāraṇīmukheṣu vā śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_9: kiṃ bodhimārge śikṣitavyam, atra bodhimārge śikṣamāṇena sarvadharmāḥ sarvākārair jñātavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:225_10: na ca bhagavan dharmadhātāv ime vikalpās tasmāt mā haiva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāseṣu caran na prapañcaṃ prapañcayet.
S06psp_6-8u:225_11_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan dharmadhātāv ime vikalpā na ca dharmadhātau rūpaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:225_11_1: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cānyatra rūpād dharmadhātur nānyatra
S06psp_6-8u:225_11_2: vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānād dharmadhātuḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_12: rūpam eva dharmadhātuḥ dharmadhātur eva rūpaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_15: saṃskārā eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_16: vijñānam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:225_17: yathā madhyame parivartakṛtaṃ tathā sarvadharmā jñātavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:226_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:226_1: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
S06psp_6-8u:226_2: rūpam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva rūpam,
S06psp_6-8u:226_3: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:226_4_0: yadi punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kañcid dharmaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:226_4_1: dharmadhātuvmirmuktaṃ paśyen nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ pratiṣṭheta
S06psp_6-8u:226_4_2: prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātuṃ
S06psp_6-8u:226_5: atas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān dharmadhātum eva jñātvānāmakāt (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:226_6: 85) sarvadharmān nāmasaṃketena deśayatīdaṃ rūpam ime vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā,
S06psp_6-8u:226_7: idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
S06psp_6-8u:226_8: imāḥ pāramitāḥ, imāni śūnyatāmukhāni, ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā, imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidharaṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:227_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā sa kiṃcid eva dravyam adhiṣṭhāya vividhāni rūpagatāni darśayet,
S06psp_6-8u:227_1: strīvigrahaṃ vā puruṣavigrahaṃ vā hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:227_2: udyānāni vā nagarāṇi vā ārāmaramaṇīyāni vā nadīramaṇīyakaṃ vā puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyakaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:227_4: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyagaṇāṃś ca khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā darśayet mahatā gītavāditena janaṃ ramayet,
S06psp_6-8u:227_5: dānaṃ vā dadan śīlaṃ vā rakṣan kṣāntiṃ vā saṃpādayamāno vīryaṃ vārabhamāṇo dhyānaṃ vā samāpadyamānaḥ prajñāṃ vā bhāvayet.
S06psp_6-8u:227_6: sa tatraibhir ākāraiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni vā gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni vā darśayec cāturmahārājākāyikān vā devān darśayet,
S06psp_6-8u:227_7_0: sumeruṃ vā darśayet trayastriṃśān vā devān darśayed yāmān tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino
S06psp_6-8u:227_7_1: brahmapārṣadyān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
S06psp_6-8u:227_7_2: apramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān śuddhāvāsān aspṛhān
S06psp_6-8u:227_7_3: atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān darśayed,
S06psp_6-8u:227_8: ākāśānantyāyatanāni vā vijñānānantyāyatanāṃ vā ākiñcanyāyatanāṃ vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāṃ devān vā darśayed,
S06psp_6-8u:227_9: rūpiṇaḥ srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_6-8u:227_10: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti, vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti, dhyānapāramitāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:86) caranti, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti, yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau caranti,
S06psp_6-8u:227_12: te 'bhijñā abhinirharanti, tābhiś ca vikrīḍanti sattvāś ca paripācayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:227_16: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vā mahāmaitrīṃ vā mahākaruṇāṃ vā niṣpādayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:227_17: tān apy ādarśayet, sarvāṅgapratyaṅgesu paripūrṇaṃ vā buddhavigraham ādarśayet.
S06psp_6-8u:227_19: aho yāvat suśikṣito batāyaṃ manuṣya iva śobhanaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:227_20: yad utaivaṃ janaṃ rameyati vividhañ ca rūpam ādarśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:227_22: ye khalu tatra manuṣyā bhavanti paṇḍitā medhāvino nipuṇās tadrūpayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgatās teṣām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:227_25: ayaṃ ca manuṣya imaṃ janapadam evam asaṃvidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu ramayati,
S06psp_6-8u:227_26: tac cāsya jñānaṃ bhavaty adravye 'sminn eva jano dravyasaṃjñī.
S06psp_6-8u:227_27: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na kañcid dharmadhātuvinirmuktaṃ samanupaśyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena,
S06psp_6-8u:227_28: na ca sattvam upalabhate na ca sattvaprajñaptiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:228_0: sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dāne niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:228_1: dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye dānaṃ dadāti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:229_0: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati parāṃś ca śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati śīlasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:229_1: ye 'pi cānye śīlaṃ rakṣanti, teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:230_0: ātmanā ca kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati parāṃś ca kṣāntau niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:230_1: kṣānteś ca varṇaṃ bhāsate, ye 'pi cānye kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:231_0: ātmanā ca vīryam ārabhate parāṃś ca vīrye niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:231_1: vīryasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye vīryam ārabhante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:232_2: dhyānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye dhyānaṃ samāpadyante teṣāṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:233_0: ātmanā ca prajñāṃ bhāvayati parāṃś ca prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:233_1: prajñāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye prajñāṃ bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:234_0: ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:234_2: daśānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:234_3: ye 'pi cānye daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:234_7: ye 'pi cānye pañcaśikṣāpadasamādāne vartante teṣāṃ varṇavādī bhāvati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:235_1: parāṃś cāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgate poṣadhe samādāpayaty āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya ca poṣadhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:235_2: ye 'pi cānye āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ poṣadham upavasanti teṣāñ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:236_2: ye 'pi cānye 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpttidhāraṇīmukhāni samāpadyante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:237_3: ye 'pi cānye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pravartante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:238_3: 88) bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayanti teṣāñ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:239_3: ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryāsatyāni bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:240_3: ye 'pi cānye pañcābhijñā niṣpādayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:242_3: ye 'pi cānye mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:243_3: ye 'pi cānye dvātriṃśanmahāpurṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayanti teṣāñ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:244_0: yadi subhūte na dharmadhātur yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathā madhye na bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena dharmadhātuṃ śodhayet,
S06psp_6-8u:244_1_0: na sattvāṃś ca paripācayet. yasmāt tarhi subhūte dharmadhātur yathaiva pūrvaṃ tathāiva
S06psp_6-8u:244_1_1: paścāt tathāiva madhye tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:245_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann atyantatayā sattvo nopalabhyate na ca sattvaprajñaptiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:246_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:246_1: bhūtakotiṃ subhūte 'pramāṇīkṛtya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:246_2: yadi subhūte anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ syād anyā sattvakoṭir na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:246_3: yasmāt tarhi subhūte nānyā bhūtakoṭir nānyā sattvakoṭis tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satttvānām arthāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:246_4: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caran bhūtakoṭyavikopanāyai sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:247_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:247_2: kiṃ punar bhagavan bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhet? yadi bhagavan bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_6-8u:247_4: na ca bhagavan svabhāvaḥ svabhāve 'smin pratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_6-8u:247_5: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06psp_6-8u:248_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:248_3: api tu khalu subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:248_4: na cānyā bhūtakoṭir anyā sattvakoṭir iti hi subhūte bhūtakoṭiś ca sattvakoṭiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_6-8u:249_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:249_1_0: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato
S06psp_6-8u:249_1_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06psp_6-8u:250_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:250_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:250_2: dāne pratiṣṭhāpya tasya dānasya pūrvāntāparāntam ācaṣṭe yathaiva tad dānaṃ pūrvāntataḥ śūnyam aparāntataḥ śūnyaṃ madhyataḥ śūnyaṃ tat tathā tad dānaphalam api śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:250_3: deyam api śūnyaṃ, dānapatir api śūnyo, dāyako 'pi dāyakasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:250_5: (PSP_6-8:90) evaṃ kulaputra sarva ete dharmā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_6-8u:250_6: mā cānyad dānaṃ mansyase, 'nyad dānapatiṃ maṃsyase, 'nyad dānaphalaṃ maṃsyase, 'nyaṃ pratigrāhakaṃ maṃsyase,
S06psp_6-8u:250_7: 'nyāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ maṃsyase, yatas tvaṃ kulaputra nānyad dānaṃ maṃsyase,
S06psp_6-8u:250_8: nānyaṃ dānapatiṃ maṃsyase, nānyaṃ dānaphalaṃ maṃsyase, nānyaṃ pratigrāhakaṃ maṃsyase,
S06psp_6-8u:250_9: nānyāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ maṃsyase, tatas ta etad dānam amṛtāvahaṃ bhaviṣyaty amṛtaphalam amṛtaparyavasānam,
S06psp_6-8u:250_10: etena ca tvaṃ dānena mā rūpaṃ pratigrahīṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:250_11: mā vedanāṃ mā saṃjñāṃ mā saṃskārāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:250_12: mā vijñānaṃ pratigrahīṣyasi. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tavaitad dānaṃ śūnyaṃ dānasvabhāvena,
S06psp_6-8u:250_16: na dānaphalam upalabhyate, na pratigrāhaka upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā sarva ete dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:251_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:251_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya praṇātipātāt prativirato bhava,
S06psp_6-8u:251_2: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paiśūnyāt paruṣavacanād abaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādād ehi tvaṃ kulaputra mithyādṛṣṭiṃ prahāya mithyādṛṣṭheḥ prativirato bhava,
S06psp_6-8u:251_3: naiṣāṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ kaścit svabhāvo vidyate yathā tvayā kalpito 'haṃ tat kulaputropaparīkṣe svabhāvaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:251_4: katama eṣa dharmaḥ prāṇo nāma yo jīvitād vyaparopyate yena vā vyaparopyate? evam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācārā mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśūnyaṃ paruṣavacanam abaddhapralāpo 'bhidhyā vyāpādaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:251_5: katama eṣa dharmo mithyādṛṣṭir nāma yo vā mithyāṃ paśyaty? anena subhūte upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:251_6: tasya dānasya ca śīlasya ca phalam ākāṅkṣate,
S06psp_6-8u:251_7: tad api dānaphalaṃ ca śīlaphalaṃ ca svabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:251_8: tataḥ sa kulaputro 'nuttrastasya dānaphalasya ca śīlaphalasya ca phalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ viditvā (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:251_9: 91) tatra nābhiniviśate anabhiniveśamāno 'vikṣepam utpādya prajñām utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:251_10: yayā prajñayā sarvānuśayaparyutthānāni cchitvānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāti lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_6-8u:251_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ parinirvāyād yena ca parmirvāyād,
S06psp_6-8u:251_12: api tu khalu punar etad eva tat parinirvāṇaṃ yad utātyantaśūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:252_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parasattvān parapudgalān,
S06psp_6-8u:252_1: kṣudhān vyāpannacittān dṛṣṭvā evam avavadaty anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:252_2: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntiṃ saṃpādaya kṣamī ca bhavaśūrato dātacitto 'dhivāsanajātīyo yatra tvaṃ vyāpadyase sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā hantopaparīkṣasva bhāvaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:252_3: kulaputra kutrāhaṃ vyāpadye? ko vā vyāpadyate? kasya vā vyāyadyate? sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:252_4: yā ca prakrtiśūnyatā na sā jātu na śūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_0: sā ca na tathāgataiḥ krtā, na pratyekabuddhair na śrāvakair na bodhisattvair na devair
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_1: na nāgair na yakṣair na gandharvair nāsurair na garuḍair na kiṃnarair na mahoragair
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_2: na caturbhir mahārājair na śakreṇa devānām indreṇa na yāmena devaputreṇa na tuṣitena
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_3: devaputreṇa na nirmāṇaratinā devaputrair na paranirmitavaśavartinā devaputrair na
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_4: brahmapārṣadyair na brahmapurohitair na mahābrahmabhir na parīttābhair nāpramāṇābhair
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_5: nābhāsvarair na parīttaśubhair nāpramāṇaśubhair na śubhakṛtsnair nānabhrakair na
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_6: puṇyaprasavair na bṛhatphalair na śuddhāvasair nātapair na sudṛśair na sudarśanair
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_7: nākaniṣṭhair devaputrair nākāśānantyāyatanair na vijñānānantyāyatanair nākiñcanyāyatanair
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_8: na naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaiḥ kṛtā hanta kulaputropaparīkṣasva kutrāhaṃ vyāpadye?
S06psp_6-8u:252_5_9: ko vā vyāpadyate? kasya vā vyāpadyate? sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā na ca śūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:252_6_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:252_6_1: niyojayaty ayaṃ hetur idaṃ phalaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ niyojayann anupūrveṇa yāvad anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:252_8_0: 92) punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid asti yo vā
S06psp_6-8u:252_8_1: prāpnuyād yena vā prāpnuyād yatra vā prāpnuyād iyaṃ subhūte bhūtakoṭir yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:252_8_2: yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo nātra sattva
S06psp_6-8u:252_9: tat kasya hetoh? sattvaviviktatā hi sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:253_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ sattvān hīnavīryān dṛṣṭvā kāyike ca caitasike ca vīrye samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:253_1: na kulaputra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kasyacid dharmasya saṃsīdanā vidyate yatra vā saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yo vā saṃsīdyet,
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_0: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ śūnyatā nātivartate hantedānīṃ kāyikaṃ ca caitasikañ
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_1: ca vīryaṃ janayitvā kauśīdyam avasṛjya kuśala eva karmaṇy udyacchasva yadi vā dāne
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_2: yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau yadi vā vīrye yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñāyāṃ yadi
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_4: yadi vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu yadi vāryasatyeṣu yadi vādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yadi
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_5: vā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yadi vādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yadi vā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_6: yadi vābhijñāsu yadi vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu yadi vā
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_7: yāvat sarvadharmeṣu sarvān etān kulaputra dharmān anāvaraṇān prekṣasva svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā
S06psp_6-8u:253_2_8: na hy anāvaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu kasyacit saṃsīdanā vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:253_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvān samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:253_4: tathā ca pratiṣṭhāpayati yathā dvayan na saṃvidyate.
S06psp_6-8u:253_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi prakṛtiśūnyatādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_6-8u:253_6: na hy advayo dharmaḥ kvacit kauśīdyam āpadyate.
S06psp_6-8u:254_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatayā vīryasattvān avatārayaty anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:254_1_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryam ārabhasva yadi vā dāne yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau yadi
S06psp_6-8u:254_1_1: vā vīrye yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñāyāṃ yadi vā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:254_2_0: 93) yadi vā vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu yadi vā daśatathāgatabaleṣu yadi
S06psp_6-8u:254_2_1: vā caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yadi vā catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yadi vā mahākaruṇāyāṃ yadi
S06psp_6-8u:254_2_2: vāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mā etān dharmān dvayato manasikuru mādvayataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:254_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? prakṛtiśūnyā hy ete dharmā na hi prakṛtiśūnyatā dvayato mānasikartavyā nādvayataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:254_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:255_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānām arthaṃ karoty upāyakauśalyena dhyānabhāvanāyām evāvatārayati,
S06psp_6-8u:255_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānaṃ bhāvaya mā ca vikṣepasaṃjñī bhava.
S06psp_6-8u:255_2: tat kasya hetoh? prakṛtiśūnyā hy ete dharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yo vikṣepyate vā ekāgrī bhavati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:255_3: sa tvam atra dhyāne sthitvā yad yad evaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kariṣyasi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06psp_6-8u:255_4: yadi vā dānan dāsyasi yadi vā śīlaṃ rakṣasi yadi vā kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:255_5: yadi vā vīryam ārabhase yadi vā dhyānam utpādayiṣyasi yadi vā prajñā bhāvayiṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:255_8_0: yadi vāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattīr yadi vābhijñā yadi vā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvido
S06psp_6-8u:255_8_1: yadi vā mahāmaitrī yadi vā mahākaruṇā yadi vāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān yadi vā
S06psp_6-8u:255_8_2: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yadi vāśītyanuvyañjanāni yadi vā śrāvakamārgaṃ yadi
S06psp_6-8u:255_8_3: vā pratyekabuddhamārgaṃ yadi vā bodhisattvamārgaṃ yadi vā buddhamārgaṃ yadi vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:255_8_4: yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vānāgāmiphalaṃ yadi vārhattvaṃ yadi vā pratyekabodhiṃ
S06psp_6-8u:255_9: 94) sarvākārajñatāṃ yadi vā sattvān paripācayiṣyasi yadi vā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyasi,
S06psp_6-8u:255_10: tasya te ime kuśalā dharmā alpakṛcchreṇa prādurbhaviṣyanti prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:255_11: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:255_13: kiṃ kuśalagaveṣī sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ satatasamitaṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_6-8u:255_15: yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:255_16_0: sa tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na jātu vipraṇakṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:255_16_1: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syād dhāraṇīpratilabdhaś ca satatasamitaṃ bhavaty ahīṇendriyo yadi
S06psp_6-8u:255_16_2: vā kāyendriyeṇa yadi vā vāgindriyeṇa yadi vā manaindriyeṇa.
S06psp_6-8u:255_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvākārajñatāṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayaty anayā sarvākārajñatayā subhāvitayā sarvamārgāḥ subhāvitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:255_18: yadi vā śrāvakamārgo yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārgo yadi vā bodhisattvamārgas tasyābhijñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitam upakārībhūtā bhaviṣyanty avipraṇāśayogeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:255_19: sa tāsu vaipākikīṣv abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti na parihīyate pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃsarann,
S06psp_6-8u:255_20: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:256_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvopāyakauśalyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:256_1: sa tayā prajñāpāramitayā subhāvitayā sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:256_2_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yad yad evaṃ karma karoṣi kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā tat sarvam
S06psp_6-8u:256_2_1: amṛtādhigamāya pariṇāmaya tathā te ete dharmāḥ sarva amṛtāvigamāya bhaviṣyanty amṛtaparyavasānāya
S06psp_6-8u:256_3: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmo 'bhiniviśate yaḥ parihīyate.
S06psp_6-8u:256_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatā parihīyate,
S06psp_6-8u:256_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā na bhāvo nābhāvas tat kim abhāvo 'bhāve dharme parihāsyaty,
S06psp_6-8u:256_8: 95) mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06psp_6-8u:256_9: sa evam avavadann evam anuśāsan na jātv akarmako 'bhūt,
S06psp_6-8u:256_10: sa ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:256_11: parāṃś ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayaty evaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge samanvāgata upoṣadhe.
S06psp_6-8u:256_12: ātmanā ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_13: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_14: ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitaṃ karuṇāvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_17: ātmanā ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihārī bhavati parāṃś ca satatasamitam upekṣāvihāre samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_18: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayanti parāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_19: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayati parāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_20: ātmanā ca sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu ca śikṣate parāṃś ca sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvapāramitāsu ca samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_21: ātmanā ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu śikṣate parāṃś ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisamvidāvenikabuddhadharmeṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_22: ātmanā ca dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanāni paripūrayati parāṃś ca dvātriṃsanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanapariniṣpattaye samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_23: jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_24: ātmanā ca sakṛdāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_25: ātmanā cānāgāmiphale jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cānāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_26: ātmanā cārhattve jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś cārhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_27: ātmanā ca pratyekabodhau jñānam utpādayati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati parāṃś ca pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:256_28: ātmanā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mārgam utpādayati parāṃś ca tatra mārge 'vavadaty anuśāsti pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_6-8u:256_29: evaṃ khalu (PSP_6-8:96) subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacaryāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena na jātv akarmako 'bhūt.
S06psp_6-8u:257_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:257_1: yadi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:257_2: na dharmo nādharmaḥ, kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisaṃpratiṣṭhate?
S06psp_6-8u:258_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:258_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, yathā vadasi prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvā upalabhyante na dharmo nādharmaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:258_2: yadi punaḥ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā abhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyām abhisaṃprāsthāsyad,
S06psp_6-8u:258_3: evaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya prakṛtiśūnyaṃ dharmaṃ deśayed,
S06psp_6-8u:258_4: rūpaṃ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyaṃ, vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā, vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcaskandhāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:258_5: dvādaśāyatanāny aṣṭādaśadhātavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:258_6_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_6-8u:258_6_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni
S06psp_6-8u:258_7_0: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_6-8u:258_7_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:258_9: sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:258_10: yadi punaḥ subhūte 'dhyātmaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyad,
S06psp_6-8u:258_11: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ dharmam uddekṣyan,
S06psp_6-8u:258_12: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā vinaśyati na ca kūṭasthā bhavati na ca sā punar apakrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:258_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi sā deśasthā na pradeśasthā na ca sā kvacid gacchati nāpi (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:258_14: 97) kutaścid āgacchati, eṣā sā dharmasthititā, yatra na kasyacid dharmasyācayo vā upacayo vopalabhyate,

S06psp_6-8u:274_2_1: vā śūnyatā vā bodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_6-8u:274_2_3: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir yo vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau caret,
S06psp_6-8u:274_3: sarva ete dharmā lokavyavahāram upādāya prajñaptā na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_6-8u:274_4: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:274_5: na punas tac cittam upalabhate na sattvaṃ na bodhiṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:274_6: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yasmin samaye subhūtinā kleśāḥ prahīnā indriyāṇi pratilabdhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:274_7: ānantaryaś ca samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāptam anāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā prāptam,
S06psp_6-8u:274_8: api nu tasmin samaye svapna upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:276_0: bhagavān āha: tat kathaṃ subhūtināmnā sthavireṇa tvayārhattvaṃ prāptam iti prajñaptam?
S06psp_6-8u:278_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte lokavyavahāreṇa bodhisattvaḥ prajñapto lokavyavahāreṇa rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:278_2_1: ca prajñaptāni lokavyavahāreṇa sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmā
S06psp_6-8u:278_3_0: na punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samyaksaṃbodhau kaścid dharma upalabdho yasya
S06psp_6-8u:278_3_1: dharmasyopacayaṃ vāpacayaṃ vā kuryād upakāraṃ vāpakāraṃ vā kuryād dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtim
S06psp_6-8u:278_8: yāvat sarvadharmān upalapsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:278_9: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:279_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:279_1_0: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃsatsu
S06psp_6-8u:279_1_1: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_6-8u:279_1_2: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran bodhimārgañ ca pariśodhyābhavyo 'nuttarāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:279_2: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_6-8u:280_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:280_1: na ca dānam upalabhate, na dānapratigrāhakan nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:280_2: (PSP_6-8:106) tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
S06psp_6-8u:280_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:280_4: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na ca prajñām upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:280_5: yo vā bhāvayed yad vā bhāvayet tad api nopalabhate nāpy anyatraiteṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_6-8u:280_6: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum.
S06psp_6-8u:280_7: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:280_8: evaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:280_9: yo vā bhāvayati yad vā bhāvayati tad api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:280_11: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva utsahate bodhimārge caritum,
S06psp_6-8u:280_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_6-8u:281_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:281_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dāne yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_6-8u:282_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:282_1: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalyena rūpaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:282_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:282_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ na yojayati na viyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:282_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:282_5: evaṃ na dānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā yojayati na viyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:282_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:282_7_0: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_6-8u:282_7_1: dharmā nādhyātmaśūnyatā na bahirdhāśūnyatā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:282_8: 107) na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni na vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yojayanti na viyojayanti.
S06psp_6-8u:282_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā.
S06psp_6-8u:283_0: sāriputra āha: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yo yojayati vā viyojayati vā,
S06psp_6-8u:283_3: na hy aśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_6-8u:284_0: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_6-8u:284_1: yathā vadasi na śakyāśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:284_2: yadi khalūpāyakauśalyena śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvam upalabhate gṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:284_3: atha na labhate, tat kiṃ grahīṣyati, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ dānapāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:284_4: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānam ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:284_5: imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni imāḥ pāramitā imāḥ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_6-8u:284_9: tat kiṃ grahīṣyaty agrāhyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:284_10_0: agrāhyā dhyānapāramitā, agrāhyā vīryapāramitā, agrāhyā kṣāntipāramitā, agrāhyā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:284_10_1: agrāhyā dānapāramitā, agrāhyāḥ sarvaśūnyatā, agrāhyā bodhipakṣyā dharmā, agrāhyāṇy
S06psp_6-8u:284_12: iyaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāgrāhyapāramitā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_6-8u:284_13: atra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yatra śikṣamāṇo bodhiattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣām api na lapsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:284_14_0: (PSP_6-8:108) kutaḥ punar bodhiṃ kutaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kutaḥ punar bodhisattvadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:284_14_1: kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ śrāvakadharmān kutaḥ punaḥ pṛthagjanadharmān.
S06psp_6-8u:284_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāriputra na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvo vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:284_16_0: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ pṛthagjanadharmaḥ katamaḥ srotaāpannaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:284_16_1: katamaḥ sakṛdāgāmī katamo 'nāgāmī katamo 'rhan katamaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamo bodhisattvaḥ
S06psp_6-8u:284_18: yeṣu dharmeṣu nirdiśyate pṛthagjano vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā samyaksaṃbuddho vā.
S06psp_6-8u:285_0_0: śāriputra āha: avastukānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ āgamaḥ prajñāyate? ayaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:285_0_1: pṛthagjano 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho
S06psp_6-8u:285_1: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:285_2: kiṃ nu śāriputra rūpasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:286_0: śāriputra āha: no bhagavan, naitat sugatānyatra viparyastaś cittaḥ pṛthagjano rūpam ity abhiniviṣṭo,
S06psp_6-8u:287_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ nu śāriputra vijñānasya vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:288_0: sāriputra āha: no bhagavan, naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano vijñānam ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:289_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ śāriputra yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ yathā bālapṛthakjano 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:290_0: śāriputra āha: no bhagavan naitat sugatānyatra viparyastacittaḥ pṛthagjano yāvat sarvadharmā ity abhiniviṣṭaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:291_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyenāvastukān dharmān paśyann (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:292_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:292_1: katamaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyenāvastukān sarvadharmān paśyann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:293_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:293_1: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasya vastu samanupaśyati yatra vastūni pratihanyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:293_2: yatra pratihanyamāna ālīyeta ālīyamānaḥ saṃsīdet kauśīdyam āpadyeta,
S06psp_6-8u:293_3: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra avastukā ajīvā nirjīvā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:293_4_0: anyatra samohena sattvā abhiniviṣṭāḥ skandheṣu vā dhātuṣu vā āyataneṣu vā pratītyasamutpādeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:293_4_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu vā tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān

S06psp_6-8u:293_4_3: māyākārasadṛśam ātmānam adhiṣṭhāya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:293_5: ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣāṃ dānakathāṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:293_11: yadā te sattvā dāne pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:293_12: śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti,

S06psp_6-8u:294_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:294_1: kiṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva aupalaṃbhiko 'saṃvidyamānāṃ sattvān dāne niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:294_2: śīle niyojayati, kṣāntau niyojayati, vīrye niyojayati, dhyāne niyojayati, prajñāyāṃ niyojayati. uttare cācāryā nairyāṇikīṃ kathāṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:295_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:295_1: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kaścid upalaṃbhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:295_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcit sattvam upalabhate 'nyatra saṃvṛttisaṃketena vyavaharati,

S06psp_6-8u:295_7: prāg eva yaḥ prāpayiṣyati, yena vā prāpayiṣyati, evaṃ khalu śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:296_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:296_1: mahotpādo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na ca nāma bhagavan kasyacid dharmasyaikatvaṃ vā nānātvaṃ vā pṛthaktvaṃ vā upalabhate,

S06psp_6-8u:297_7: 111) na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyakaḥ,

S06psp_6-8u:297_10: kutaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpannadharmāḥ kutaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni bhaviṣyanty,

S06psp_6-8u:297_12_1: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvānuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:297_13: na cātra kaścid dharmasvabhāvo yam upalabhate yo vā śakyo 'dhimoktuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:297_15: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate yena saṃnāhena saṃnahya na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_6-8u:297_20: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra māyākāranirmitaḥ puruṣo bahūni prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy abhinirmimīte,
S06psp_6-8u:297_22: saṃtarpyaivam udānam udānayed bahu me puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:297_23: tat kiṃ manyase? śāriputrāpi nu tatra kaścid bhojito vā saṃtarpito vā bhavet.
S06psp_6-8u:299_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06psp_6-8u:299_0_1: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu
S06psp_6-8u:299_0_2: smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcendriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu
S06psp_6-8u:299_0_3: saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge mārge sarvaśūnyatāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭasu
S06psp_6-8u:299_0_4: vimokṣamukheṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu
S06psp_6-8u:299_0_5: sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:299_1: 112) aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāñ caran bodhimārgāṃ ca paripūrayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:299_2: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati na ca kañcit sattvam upalabhate yam upalabhya vinayet.
S06psp_6-8u:300_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:300_1: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:301_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:301_1_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_6-8u:301_1_1: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:301_2: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_6-8u:301_3_2: caran sattvān paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:302_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati?
S06psp_6-8u:303_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti sattvebhyo dānaṃ datvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_1: iha kulaputrā mā dānam āgrahaṇato grahīṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:303_4: neha kulaputrā paramārthena dānaṃ na dānapatir na pratigrāhakaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:303_6: na ca prakṛtiśūnyā dharmān gṛhṇanty agrāhyā śūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:303_7: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:303_8: na cātra dānam upalabhate na dānapatiṃ na pratigrāhakam anupalaṃbhapāramitaiṣā (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:303_9: 113) yad uta dānapāramitā, sa dānadātṛpratigrāhakān anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sattvān srotaāpattiphale niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_13: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_14: sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti, parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati, dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'pi cānye dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:303_16: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpaṃ dānaṃ datvā kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ vā sahavratāyopapadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:303_19: koṭṭarājo vā bhavati, cakravartirājyaṃ vā pratilabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:303_20: sa tatra sattvāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:303_23: evaṃ tān sattvān dānena saṃgṛhyānupūrveṇa śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_24_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
S06psp_6-8u:303_24_1: caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptabodhyaṅgeṣv
S06psp_6-8u:303_27: pratyekāṃ bodhim anuprāpayaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_29: tatra na kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena saṃvidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:303_32: ātmānaṃ mocayatha saṃsārāt, parāṃś ca mocayiṣyatha, evaṃ yūyam ātmanaś ca mahāntam arthaṃ kariṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:303_34: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:303_35: yathā caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya na jātu durgatiṃ patati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_37: tat kasya hetoḥ? yādṛśaṃ hi vījaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_38: tasya cakravartino yadā yācanakā āgacchanti tadā tasya cakravartino rājña evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_39: yeṣāṃ mayā kṛtaśaś cakravartiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ nānyatra sattvānām (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:303_40: 114) arthāya, tad etad yuṣmākam eva dattaṃ bhavatu,
S06psp_6-8u:303_41: tasmd atra na mayānena cakravartirājyenārthaḥ prāg evānye nānyatra sattvānām arthāya saṃsāra upāttaḥ sa karuṇāyamāno mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_42: yāvan mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:303_43: te ca sattvā nopalabhyante ye pariniṣpannāḥ syur ity anyatra saṃjñānām asaṃketaṃ vyavahāra iti,
S06psp_6-8u:303_45: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:303_46: yathā carato na kiṃcit sattvānām antike 'parityakṣaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:303_47: antaśa ātmamāṃsāny api, prāg eva bāhyāny upakaraṇāni,
S06psp_6-8u:303_49: tāni punaḥ katamāny upakaraṇāni yad uta dānapāramitopakaraṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:303_54: imāni tāny upakaraṇāni yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimokṣyante.
S06psp_6-8u:304_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasyā dānaṃ dadad evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣet,
S06psp_6-8u:304_1_0: ahaṃ bho yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣatāhaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā
S06psp_6-8u:304_1_1: pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair vā yānair vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamanimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍair
S06psp_6-8u:304_3: glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair vā yāvad anyatarair vā mānuṣyakaiḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇair,
S06psp_6-8u:304_5: tad ahaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annādinā vā saptabhir vā ratnair,
S06psp_6-8u:304_7: tad yūyaṃ saṃvaraśīle sthitvānupūrveṇa duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatha tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:305_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntisauratye niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:305_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvā ye kupyanti vā vyāpadyante vā teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06psp_6-8u:305_2: kena yūyaṃ kāraṇena kulaputrā vyāpadyadhve doṣam utpādayatha? tad ahaṃ yūṣmākaṃ sarvaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:305_3: yasyārthena kupyatha vyāpadyatha tat mamāntikād gṛhṇītha,
S06psp_6-8u:305_4_0: tena bhagavatām avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy annena vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā śayanāsanair
S06psp_6-8u:305_4_2: vā vividhair vā maṇiratnair vā yāvad anyatarānyatarair vā mānuṣyopakaraṇapariṣkārair
S06psp_6-8u:305_5: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān kṣāntisauratye niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:305_6_0: naivātra kaścid bhāvo 'sti yaḥ bhāvo yena yuṣmākaṃ krodha upajāyata abhūtasaṃkalpa
S06psp_6-8u:305_6_1: eṣa krodho naitasya kiṃcid vastv asti yasya yūyaṃ vastunaḥ kṛtaśo 'bhisajjatha kupyatha
S06psp_6-8u:305_6_2: vyāpadyadhve 'bhiṣajya kupitvā vyāpadya daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharathānyamanyaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:305_7: tad yūyam asadbhūtasaṃkalpitakṣubhitā narakaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:305_8: yā apy anyāḥ kāścid gatayas tāsu ca duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyatha,
S06psp_6-8u:305_9: haṃbho puruṣā māvastukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tat karma parigṛhṇīta yena parigṛhītena manuṣyapratilābho na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:305_11: sa khalu punar bho puruṣo durlabho buddhotpādo durlabho manuṣyalābho durlabhaḥ kṣaṇasaṃpad durlabhaḥ saṃsārāṃ mokṣaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:305_12: mā imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayiṣyatha mā vicikitsā bhaviṣyatha kṣaṇaprāptāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:305_13: tato bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayāti,
S06psp_6-8u:305_15: kṣānteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:305_16: tatas tān sattvān kṣāntyāṃ niyojayitvā kṣāntyāṃ sthāpayitvānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:305_17: 116) parinirvāpayati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_6-8u:305_18: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntisauratye sattvān niyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:306_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_6-8u:306_2: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān kuśīdān hīnavīryān alasān viditvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:306_3: kasya yūyaṃ kṛtaśaḥ kauśīdyam āpadyadhve? ta evam avocat,
S06psp_6-8u:306_4: pratyayavaikalyena, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran tān sattvān etad avocat,
S06psp_6-8u:306_5: hambho puruṣā ahaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvapratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:306_6: yadi vā dānaṃ yadi vā śīlaṃ yadi vā kṣāntiṃ yadi vā yair ākārair yair liṅgair vīryam ārabhedhvaṃ tān bhavatām upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:306_7: tatas te sattvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upakaraṇair vīryam ārabhante kāyikaṃ vā caitasikaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:306_8: tena kāyikena vā caitasikena vā vīryeṇa sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:306_9: yaiḥ kuśalair dharmair āryān anāsravān dharmān bhāvayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:306_10: yān bhāvayamānā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyanti sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:306_11: pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpsyanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_6-8u:306_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ sattvān niyojayati.
S06psp_6-8u:307_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān avavadatīha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:307_1: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ dhyānan na samāpadyadhve? tam evam āhuḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:307_2: pratyayavaikalyeneti, tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva etad avocat,
S06psp_6-8u:307_3: haṃbho purusā ahaṃ tān pratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:307_5: idam iti vā bahirdhety adhyātmeti vādhyātmabahirdheti,
S06psp_6-8u:307_6_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tān pratyayān upasaṃharati yaiḥ pratyayair
S06psp_6-8u:307_6_1: upasaṃhṛtair na vitarkayanti tatas te sattvā vitarkeṣu cchinneṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:307_11: te tair dhyānais taiś cāpramāṇair yāvad (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:307_13: tatrāpare bodhimārgāṃ na parihīyante yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:307_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sattvān evam avavadati.
S06psp_6-8u:308_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:308_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:308_2: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ prajñāpāramitān na bhāvayatha? ta evam avocat,
S06psp_6-8u:308_3: pratyayavaikalyeneti, tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:308_4: mamopari pūrayam upakaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīta mamopary upakaraṇaṃ gṛhītvā dānaṃ dadata,
S06psp_6-8u:308_5: śīlaṃ rakṣata kṣāntyā saṃpādayata vīryam ārabhadhvaṃ dhyānaṃ saṃpādayadhvam,
S06psp_6-8u:308_7_0: asti kaścid yaḥ prajñāparamitābhāvanāyām upalabhyate? ātmā vā sattvo vā jivo vā jantur
S06psp_6-8u:308_7_1: vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā kārako vā vedako vā jānako vā
S06psp_6-8u:308_7_2: paśyako vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vā ārūpyadhātur vā ṣaṭpārāmitā vā sarvaśūnyatā
S06psp_6-8u:308_7_3: vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
S06psp_6-8u:308_7_5: vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir
S06psp_6-8u:308_8_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kañcid dharmam upalabhate
S06psp_6-8u:308_8_1: yam upalabhyābhiniviśeta so 'nabhiniveśamāno na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:308_8_2: vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na kalpayaty ayaṃ nairayiko
S06psp_6-8u:308_8_3: 'yaṃ tiryagyoniko 'yaṃ yāmalaukiko 'yam asuro 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yam amanuṣyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:308_9: ayaṃ śīlavān ayaṃ duḥśīlo ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:308_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:309_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:309_0_1: sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:309_0_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sattvān parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:309_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām upakaraṇam upanāmayati yair upakaraṇair upagṛhītāḥ sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:309_2: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:309_3: yena mārgeṇa bhāvitena yāvat saṃsārāt parimucyante.
S06psp_6-8u:309_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sattvān parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_6-8u:310_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evaṃ sattvān paripācayati,
S06psp_6-8u:310_1_0: ete yūyaṃ bhoḥ kulaputrā mamāntikād annaṃ pānaṃ yānaṃ vastrāṃ mālyaṃ gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:310_1_1: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ cūrṇaṃ yāvat sarvān mānuṣyakopakaraṇapariṣkārān gṛhītvā saptabhiś ca
S06psp_6-8u:310_2: tad bhavatāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya,
S06psp_6-8u:310_3_0: mā caiva cintayiṣyatha, asyaiṣo 'rtho nāsmākam iti, yad bhavatā dīrgharātram eṣo
S06psp_6-8u:310_3_1: 'rthaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśa upārjitas tad yuṣmākam evaiṣa santaka ity evaṃ gṛhītvā sattvebhyo
S06psp_6-8u:310_4_0: tena ca dānena śīle niyojayadhvaṃ kṣāntyā niyojayadhvaṃ vīrye niyojayadhvaṃ dhyāne
S06psp_6-8u:310_4_1: niyojayadhvaṃ prajñāyāṃ niyojayadhvaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu niyojayadhvaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:310_7: yāvad anuttareṣv āryeṣv anāsraveṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayadhvaṃ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhāv anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayadhvam.
S06psp_6-8u:310_8: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:310_11_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:310_11_1: sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
S06psp_6-8u:310_12: ete (PSP_6-8:119) yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā teṣāṃ pratyayānām asatāṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyatha vyāpādaṃ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepaṃ dauṣprajñam āpadyadhve tān pratyayān yuṣmākam upasaṃhariṣyāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:310_13_0: annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā vastraṃ vā śayanāsanaṃ vā yāvat sarvān mānuṣyakopakaraṇapariṣkārān
S06psp_6-8u:310_13_1: sa tān sattvāṃs tathārūpeṇānugraheṇānugṛhṇāti yathārūpeṇānugrahenānugṛhītāḥ samān
S06psp_6-8u:311_0: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat:
S06psp_6-8u:311_1: katamo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena idṛśāḥ saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:312_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva caitaḥ parivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:312_1: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:312_2: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:312_4: api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:312_5: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte asti sa kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ yatrāśikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_6-8u:312_6: nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāśikṣitavyam aśikṣitvā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaknoti sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_6-8u:313_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:313_2: kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣiṣyate? na tu bhagavann aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_6-8u:313_3: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:313_4: ayaṃ dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsrāvo vā anāsravo (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:313_5: 120) vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo vā.
S06psp_6-8u:314_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:314_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:314_2: yadi punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā nābhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:314_3: yasmāt subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:314_4: api tu khalu subhūte yad evaṃ vadasi,
S06psp_6-8u:314_5: yadi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ, kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanānātvaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:314_6: iyanta iti vā neyanta iti vā,
S06psp_6-8u:314_7: ayaṃ dharmo laukiko vā lokottaro vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā saṃskṛto vāsaṃskṛto vā pṛthagjanadharmo vārhaddharmo vā pratyekabuddhadharmo vā buddhadharmo veti.
S06psp_6-8u:314_8: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti yadi jānīyur naimāṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt,
S06psp_6-8u:314_9: yasmāt tarhi subhūte na jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:314_10: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:315_0: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā prathamam evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:315_1: nātra kaścid dharmo yaḥ svena bhāvenopalabhyate 'nyatrābhisaṃskāreṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:315_2_0: tatra khalu dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam upaparīkṣeyam aham upaparīkṣamāṇo na kvacid dharme
S06psp_6-8u:315_2_1: 'bhiniveśeya yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā śūnyatāsu yadi vā saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:315_2_2: dharmeṣu yadi vā srotāapattiphale yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vānāgāmiphale yadi
S06psp_6-8u:315_2_3: vārhattve yadi vā pratyekabodhau yadi vānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_6-8u:315_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām abhiniviśate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:315_8: kutreme sattvāś caranty asaṃgrahe tad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:315_10: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evam avavadati,
S06psp_6-8u:315_11: ete yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā dānaṃ dadata tato yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati bhogeṣu,
S06psp_6-8u:315_12: teṣu ca bhogeṣu mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_13: evaṃ śīle 'vavadati tena ca śīlena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_14: evaṃ kṣāntisauratye 'vavadati tayā ca kṣāntyā mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_15: evaṃ vīrye 'vavadati mā ca tena vīryeṇa maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_16: evaṃ dhyāne 'vavadati tena ca dhyānena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_17: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadati tayā ca prajñayā mā maṃsyādhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_18: evaṃ srotaāpattiphale 'vavadati tena ca srotaāpattiphalena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_20: evam arhattve 'vavadati tena cārhattvena mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_21: evaṃ pratyekabodhāv avavadati tayā ca pratyekabodhyā mā maṃsyadhvam.
S06psp_6-8u:315_22: evaṃ buddhadharmeṣv avavadati taiś ca buddhadharmair mā maṃsyadhvaṃ na teṣu kiṃcit sāram asti.
S06psp_6-8u:315_26: ca sarvadharmās tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti ye nābhiniviśeta śūnyatāsvabhāvatām upādāya.
S06psp_6-8u:315_27: tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārge caran na kvacit pratiṣṭhate so 'pratiṣṭhānayogena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_28: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_29: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_30: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_31: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_32: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_33: sa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tatra ca na pratiṣṭhate.
S06psp_6-8u:315_34: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dhyānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yad api samāpadyate tad api śūnyaṃ yair ākāraiḥ samāpadyate te 'py ākārāḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:315_38: evaṃ maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_41: srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_42: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_43: anāgāmiphalaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_44: 'rhattvaṃ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate,
S06psp_6-8u:315_45: pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca pratilabhate na ca tatra pratiṣṭhate.
S06psp_6-8u:316_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na pratiṣṭhate?
S06psp_6-8u:317_0: bhagavān āha: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ subhūte na pratiṣṭhate.
S06psp_6-8u:317_1: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? svabhāvaś ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ nāsti yatra pratiṣṭheta yena vā pratiṣṭheta yo vā pratiṣṭheta,
S06psp_6-8u:317_3: na ca mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyam,
S06psp_6-8u:317_5: na ca mayārhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ mayārhattvaṃ na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:317_6: na ca mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na prāptavyā prāptavyā mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmir na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:317_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya nānyatra cittaṃ pratilabdham anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:317_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamām api bhūmim upādāya vartamāno 'nyatra na kiṃcic cittam utpādayaty anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:317_11: evaṃ yāvad daśamīṃ bhūmim upādāya vartamāno nānyatra kiṃcic cittam utpādayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:317_12: yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānter nānyatra kiṃcic cittam utpāditam anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher atṛptamānasaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:317_13: sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad eva kāyena (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:317_14: 123) vā parākramate vācā vā manasā vā parākramate,
S06psp_6-8u:317_15: nānyatra bodhicittāt tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicitte sthitvāvikṣiptamānaso bodhimārgam utpādayati.
S06psp_6-8u:318_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:318_1: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā anutpannāḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati?
S06psp_6-8u:319_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:319_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, sarvadharmā anutpannās tat punaḥ kathaṃ yenābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:320_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:320_1: na punar bhagavann anutpādād vā tathāgatānām utpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā.
S06psp_6-8u:321_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā,
S06psp_6-8u:321_1: ye punar imāṃ dharmasthititān na jānanti teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati yena mārgeṇa sattvān mocayati saṃsārāt.
S06psp_6-8u:322_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:322_1: kiṃ punar bhagavann anutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate utāho utpannena?
S06psp_6-8u:324_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan nānutpannena cotpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_6-8u:326_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan naiva nānutpannena naiva notpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_6-8u:327_0: subhūtir āha: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06psp_6-8u:328_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:328_1: na subhūte mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate nāmārgeṇa,
S06psp_6-8u:329_0: evam ukte āyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:329_1: yadi bhagavan bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhir anuprāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhis,
S06psp_6-8u:329_2_0: tat kathaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nirdiśyate? dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair
S06psp_6-8u:329_2_1: aśītyanuvyañjanair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiś
S06psp_6-8u:329_2_2: caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair
S06psp_6-8u:329_2_3: dharmaiś caturbhir āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir aṣṭavimokṣair
S06psp_6-8u:329_2_5: daśabhiḥ pāramitābhir viṃśatibhiḥ śūnyatābhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:330_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:330_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte buddho bodhiṃ prāpyati buddha eva bodhir eva buddhaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:332_0: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūtir evaṃ vadaty,
S06psp_6-8u:332_1: anuprāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhir iti.
S06psp_6-8u:332_2: iha subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrya saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvaśūnyatāś catvāry āryasatyāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni,
S06psp_6-8u:332_3_2: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrya vajropame samādhau
S06psp_6-8u:332_3_4: tadā tathāgata iti nirdiśyate sarvadharmān jānīta ity ataḥ sarvadarśiṃ sarvajña ity
S06psp_6-8u:333_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:333_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati?
S06psp_6-8u:334_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:334_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:334_2: 125) vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ manodauḥsīlyam ātmanaś ca parasya ca viśodhayati yaiḥ pariśudhaiḥ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:334_3: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:334_4: katamad bhagavan kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ manodauḥśīlyam?
S06psp_6-8u:335_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:335_2: adattādāne vartate, kāmamithyācāre vartate, idam ucyate kāyadauḥśīlyaṃ, yad vākkarmākuśalaṃ mṛṣāvāde vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:335_3: piśunavacane vartate, pāruṣye vartate, abaddhapralāpe vartate, idam ucyate vāgdauḥśīlyaṃ, yan manaskarmākuśalam abhidhyāyāṃ vartate,
S06psp_6-8u:336_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yat mātsaryacittam idaṃ manodauḥśīlyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:336_0_1: yad dauḥśīlyacittaṃ kṣobhacittaṃ kauśīdyacittaṃ vikṣepacittam asamāhitacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam

S06psp_6-8u:340_17_1: sparśasaṃjñā vedanāsaṃjñā tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā upādānasaṃjñā bhavasaṃjñā jātisaṃjñā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā
S06psp_6-8u:340_18: strīsaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā kāmadhātusaṃjñā rūpadhātusaṃjñā ārūpyadhātusaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyaṃ,

S06psp_6-8u:340_22: parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati, annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān sarvopakaraṇapariṣkārān dadāti,
S06psp_6-8u:340_25: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_26: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati parāṃś ca śīle samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_27: ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayati parāṃś ca kṣāntau samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_28: ātmanā ca vīryam ārabhate parāṃś ca vīrye samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_29: ātmanā ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyate parāṃś ca dhyāne samādapayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_30: ātmanā ca prajñāṃ bhāvayati, parāṃś ca prajñāyāṃ samādāpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_31: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:340_32: ātmanā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇe kṛtvā triṣu ratneṣu dānaṃ dadāti tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:341_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāni vādyāni vādayati buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā,
S06psp_6-8u:341_1: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karoti tasyaivaṃ bhavaty anena kuśalamūlena me divyāḥ śabdā manoramāḥ śrotrasukhā satatasamitaṃ vādyā bhavantu buddhakṣetre.

S06psp_6-8u:345_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃkalpair ātmanā ca sarvasattvaiś ca sārdhaṃ pañcakāmaguṇān buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā sarvasattveṣu vopanāmayati,
