S06psp_6-8u:345_3: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
S06psp_6-8u:346_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_1: yaṃ nūnam aham ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca prathame dhyāne niveśayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:346_2: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye dhyāne, ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca caturthe dhyāne niveśayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:346_5: evaṃ karuṇāmuditām ātmanā copekṣāṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃ copekṣābhāvanāyāṃ niveśayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:346_6: ātmanā cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:346_8: ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:346_9: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:346_11: ātmanā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam,
S06psp_6-8u:346_12: ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:346_14: sarvasattvā evaṃ caturbhir dhyānair avirahitā bhāveyuś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir avirahitā bhāveyuś caturbhir brāhmair vihārair avirahitā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:346_16: 129) bhaveyuḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair vimokṣamukhair avirahitā bhaveyur ity,
S06psp_6-8u:346_17: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_18: sa tāvad bodhau carati yāvad ime sarvābhiprāyāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
S06psp_6-8u:346_21: tasya svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_22: ye ca tena boodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāḥ paripācitās teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati yad uta puṇyaparigrahād,
S06psp_6-8u:346_23: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhaksetraṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:346_24: yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_26: api na bhaviṣyati, rāgadoṣamohānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_27: yāvad dvayasya nāmadheyam api na bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_33: tyāgecchatāyāḥ yāvat prajñecchatāyāḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ chandād eva vṛkṣebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti vāteritebhyaḥ evaṃ sarvebhyo 'dhyātmikabāhyebhyo dharmebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:346_34: śūnyam iti vānimittam iti vāpraṇihitain iti vā śabdo niścariṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_36: yathaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_38: yathaiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:346_39_0: yac chūnyan na tatra nimittam asti tad apraṇihitam eṣā saivaṃ rūpādharmadeśanā niścariṣyati
S06psp_6-8u:346_39_1: rātrau divase vā sthitāṇāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā śayanānāṃ vā caṅkramatāṃ vā idṛśāḥ sarvadharmadeśanā
S06psp_6-8u:346_40: tatra buddhakṣetre yadāsau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāt,
S06psp_6-8u:346_41: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiva sato ye daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:346_43: ye ca tasya varṇaṃ sattvā śroṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ vā te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhyau.
S06psp_6-8u:346_44: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_45: ayaṃ dharmo 'yan na dharmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā khalu punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva eva sa dharmaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:346_46: tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā vānavaropitakuśalamūlā vā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā kalyāṇamitrāparigṛhītā
S06psp_6-8u:346_48: anteṣu tiṣṭhanti, ucchede vā śāśvate vā, ātmanā mithyāgraheṇa gṛhītā asamyaksaṃbuddheṣu samyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñin,
S06psp_6-8u:346_49: samyaksaṃbuddheṣu vāsamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinas te 'dharme dharma iti vadanti,
S06psp_6-8u:346_50: te dharmaṃ pratikṣipanti te dharmaṃ pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_6-8u:346_51: tāṃs te buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān saṃsāraparyāpannāṃs tataḥ pāpakadṛṣṭigatād vivecayanti vivecya niyate rāśau pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_6-8u:346_52: te tatra pratiṣṭhāpitā na punar apāyeṣūpapadyante.
S06psp_6-8u:346_53: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
S06psp_6-8u:346_54_0: yasya pariśuddhasya na kiṃcit sattvānāṃ vaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:346_54_1: lokottareṣu vā dharmeṣu sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu
S06psp_6-8u:346_54_2: vā dharmeṣu yāvat sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_6-8u:347_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:347_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:348_0: bhagavān āha: niyataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:349_0: subhūtir āha: katame rāśau niyataḥ śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā?
S06psp_6-8u:350_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakarāśau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddharāśau vā niyato 'pi tu buddharāśau subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:351_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ prathamacittotpādika (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:352_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vā niyataḥ caramabhaviko vā niyato 'pi tu prathamacittotpādiko niyataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:353_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate?
S06psp_6-8u:354_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte niyataḥ patito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate.
S06psp_6-8u:354_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api tv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmi vā anāgāmi vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā niyato 'pāyeṣūpapatsyante.
S06psp_6-8u:356_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate naitat sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_6-8u:356_1_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam
S06psp_6-8u:356_1_1: upādāya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
S06psp_6-8u:356_2: maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ sattveṣu bhāvayati,
S06psp_6-8u:356_5: dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:356_6: yatrāpacāraḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣūpatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:356_7: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapadyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:356_8: tatra copapatsyate yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdaḥ śruyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:356_9: akriyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:356_10: api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito 'dhyāśayena daśākuśalān karmapathān adhyāpadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_6-8u:357_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:357_1: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ kuśaladharmasamanvāgato yad uta nāpratirūpeṣu sthāneṣūpapatsyate,
S06psp_6-8u:358_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:358_1: na punaḥ suhbūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃcintyatam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:358_2: (PSP_6-8:132) yenātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ tam ātmabhāvaṃ sattvānām arthāya pratigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:358_3: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'sty etad arhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya vā upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tiryagyonāv upapannaḥ syāt.
S06psp_6-8u:360_0: bhagavān āha: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalyam asti yena tatropapannaḥ syād,
S06psp_6-8u:360_1: ye ca tatra vadhāya parākramante tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinaye pratiṣṭhāpayati teṣām eva cārthe ātmānaṃ parityajayati,
S06psp_6-8u:360_2: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhanā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:360_3: tad anena te suhbūte paryāyenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayamāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tiryagyonau vartate.
S06psp_6-8u:361_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:361_1: katameṣu bhagavan kuśaladharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evaṃrūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_6-8u:362_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:362_1: sarvan tat subhūte kuśalaṃ karma yad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:362_2_0: sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_6-8u:362_2_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścid dharmo yo na paripūrayitavyo
S06psp_6-8u:362_3: tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryai śikṣitavayaṃ yatra śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati.
S06psp_6-8u:363_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:363_1: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvac chukladharmasamanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇāpāyeṣūpapadyate tiryagyonau vā?
S06psp_6-8u:364_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte tathāgata āryo 'nāsravaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:366_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinam ātmānam abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:367_0: subhūtir āha: kuryād bhagavan kuryāt sugata.
S06psp_6-8u:368_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryag bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:370_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tiryagyoner duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:372_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāśraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvagataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:372_1: yenātmabhāvena samanvāgatam anyān paripācayed yathā tathāgataḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:373_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatas tan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:374_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgatas tat tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_6-8u:375_0: subhūtir āha: na hi bhagavan duṣkhā apāyā?
S06psp_6-8u:376_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte māyākārā māyāṃ darśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:376_1: hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vānyān vā vividhān prāṇakajātān darśayaty api tu sa hastī vā bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:376_2: aśvo vā balīvardavigraho vānye vā vividhāḥ prāṇakajātā bhavanti.
S06psp_6-8u:378_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:378_0_1: dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:379_0_0: subhūtir āha: mahopāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo nāma bhagavann āryeṇānāsraveṇa
S06psp_6-8u:379_0_1: dharmeṇa samanvāgato yena yena hy ātmabhāvena śakyate sattvānām arthaḥ kartun taṃ
S06psp_6-8u:380_0: katameṣu bhagavan śukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalyaṃ karoti yena tair na lipyate?
S06psp_6-8u:381_0: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte sthitvā bodhisattvo (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:381_2: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarasyām adhamūrdhaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:381_3: na tatra kvacit spṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvathaiva dharmān nopalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:381_4: yad vā spṛśyeta yena vā spṛśyeta yo vā spṛśyet.
S06psp_6-8u:381_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarva ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ tatra na śūnyatayā śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate naiva śūnyatāṃ kaścit saṃspṛśati,
S06psp_6-8u:381_6: nāpi śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyatā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:381_7: iyaṃ sānupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:382_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthito nānyeṣu dharmeṣu?
S06psp_6-8u:383_0: bhagavān āha: katamo vā subhūte dharmoe yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāntargataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:384_0: subhūtir āha: yad bhagavan prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:384_2: na hi bhagavañ chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmāntargataḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:385_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:386_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:386_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharme śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:386_2: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadī vālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:386_3: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:386_4: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavansu kuśalamūlāny avaropayaty,
S06psp_6-8u:386_5: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhavaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:386_6: teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:386_7: tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati.
S06psp_6-8u:387_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:387_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tān sarvān śūnyān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:387_2: ye 'pi tatra buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ svabhāveṇa śūnyā,
S06psp_6-8u:387_4: sā ca sarvā prajñaptiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā.
S06psp_6-8u:387_5: yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:387_6: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:387_7: te 'pi prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
S06psp_6-8u:387_8: tatprādeśikī śūnyatābhaviṣyad yasmāt prādeśikī śūnyatā nopalabhyate tasmāt sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:388_0: atra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:388_1: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyañ cakṣur abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:388_2: divyaṃ śrotram ṛddhividhijñānaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ cyutyupapattim abhinirharati.
S06psp_6-8u:388_3: ābhir abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:388_4: yad iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyābhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā,
S06psp_6-8u:388_5: abhijñāsu bodhir antargatā mārgayitavyāyāṃ mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:388_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarvakuśalā dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:388_9: na ca śūnyatā kvacid abhinivekṣyate yad abhiniveśam āsvādayiṣyati niḥsvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:389_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati yena cakṣuṣā sarvadharmā śūnyān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:389_1: tat punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān dharmān āgamya tat karmābhinirūpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:389_2: yayā karmābhiniruktyā sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati na punaḥ sattvaprajñaptim uplabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:389_3: ity anupalaṃbhayogena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhijñā abhinirharati,
S06psp_6-8u:389_4: yāsv abhijñāsv abhijñā karuṇādharmāḥ kartavyās tān karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:390_0_0: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:390_0_1: diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyāṃ diśy uttarasyāṃ diśy adha ūrdhvalokadhātuṣu yāvad
S06psp_6-8u:390_1: (PSP_6-8:136) sa tatrarddhyā gatvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:390_2_0: yadi vā dānena yadi vā śīlena yadi vā kṣāntyā yadi vā vīryeṇa yadi vā dhyānena yadi
S06psp_6-8u:390_2_1: vā prajñayā yadi vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair yadi vāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhair
S06psp_6-8u:390_2_2: yadi vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmair yadi vā bodhisattvadharmair yadi vā buddhadharmais
S06psp_6-8u:391_0: tatra ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:391_1: dadata dānan duṣkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dāridryan na ca dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'rthaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
S06psp_6-8u:391_2: tasmād yūyam ātmanā ca sukhino bhaviṣyatha parāṃś ca sukhayiṣyatha mā dāridryeṇānyeṣāṃ māṃsāni khādayanto na mokṣyatha tribhir apāyaiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:392_0: ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:392_1: duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ na ca dauḥśīlyena śakyam ātmano 'thaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
S06psp_6-8u:392_2: dauḥśīlyasya ca yo vipāko narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tatra yūyaṃ triṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā ātmānam eva na śakyathoddhartuṃ prāg eva paraṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:392_3: tad bhavadbhir ekadauśīlyacittasyāpy avakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:393_0: ye sattvāḥ pratihatacittāḥ parasya caṃ krudhyanti vyāpadyante doṣam utpādayatām eṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:393_1: mā bhavanto 'nyonyaṃ kṣubhyathānyonyaṃ vyāpadyadhve mā doṣam utpādayata kṣubdhacittasya hi na kaścit kuśalo dharma āmukhī bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:393_2: tad bhavanto 'nyonyam evaṃ kṣubdhacittā vyāpannacittāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yan narakaṃ vā prapatathā tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:393_3: tad bhavadbhir ekacittenāpi na kṣobdhavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:394_0: ye kuśīdāḥ sattvās tān vīrye niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:394_1_0: mā bhavantaḥ kauśīdyam āpadyadhvaṃ na kusīdānāṃ hīnavīryāṇāṃ kācic chubhā pravṛttiḥ
S06psp_6-8u:394_1_1: sthānam etad vidyate yat kuśīdānān narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir
S06psp_6-8u:394_1_2: ekasyāpi kuśīdacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām.
S06psp_6-8u:395_0: ye vikṣiptacittāḥ sattvās tān sarvān dhyāne niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:395_1: teṣāṃ evaṃ (PSP_6-8:137) dharmaṃ deśayati, mā bhavanto muṣitasmṛtayo vikṣiptacittāś ca bhavatan muṣitasmṛtīnām vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā kuśalā dharmā bhavanti sthānam etad vidyate,
S06psp_6-8u:395_2: yaṃ muṣitasmṛtīnāṃ vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir ekasyāpi vikṣiptacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:396_0: ye duṣprajñāḥ sattvās tān sarvān prajñāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:396_1: teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, mā yūyaṃ dauṣprajñacittam utpādayedhvaṃ nāprajñānāṃ sugatigamanaṃ bhavati sthānam etad vidyate yad duṣprajñānāṃ narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā,
S06psp_6-8u:396_2: tad bhavadbhir ekacittotpādo 'pi prajñāvirahito notpādayitavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:397_0: ye rāgacaritāḥ sattvās tān śubhabhāvanāyāṃ niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:397_1: ye mārge 'sthitāḥ sattvās tān mārge niyojayati yadi vā śrāvakamārge niyojayati,
S06psp_6-8u:397_2: yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:397_3: yatra bhavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāt te dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:397_4: na svabhāvena śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śakyam abhiniveṣṭum anabhiniviṣṭā ca śūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:398_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām upakāraṃ karoti.
S06psp_6-8u:399_0: nāsti sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ śakto 'bhijñāsv asthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kartum,
S06psp_6-8u:399_1: utpathaprasthitān vā sattvān mārge 'vatārayituṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_6-8u:399_2: tadyathā subhūte 'pakṣaḥ pakṣī na śaknoty ākāśe kramitum,
S06psp_6-8u:399_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nāgamyābhijñā na śaknoti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayituṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:399_4: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:400_0_0: sa imābhir abhijñābhir abhinirhṛtābhir yad ākāṅkṣati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ tat
S06psp_6-8u:400_0_1: kariṣyati divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
S06psp_6-8u:400_0_2: drakṣyati tatra sattvā utpannās tān drakṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:400_1: dṛṣṭvā ca tān satttvān ṛddhyā gatvā cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:400_2: cittaṃ jñātvā tathāiva teṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:400_3: yadi vā dānakathāṃ (PSP_6-8:138) yadi vā śīlakathāṃ yadi vā kṣāntikathāṃ yadi vā vīryakathāṃ yadi vā dhyānakathāṃ yadi vā prajñākathāṃ yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:401_0: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇobhau śabdau śroṣyati mānuṣyañ cāmānuṣyañ ca,
S06psp_6-8u:401_1: tatra ye gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:401_2: tan divyena śrotradhātunā śrutvā tathāivodgrahīṣyati tathāivodgṛhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_6-8u:401_3: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:402_0: tasya cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ suviśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sa tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena suviśuddhena sattvānāṃ cittaṃ prajñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:402_1: cittaṃ jñātvā teṣāṃ tathāiva dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:402_2: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:403_1: apy ātmanaḥ pareṣām api sa tena pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena evaṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:403_2_0: evaṃnāmāni te 'bhūvan pūrvakās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās
S06psp_6-8u:403_2_1: tatra ye sattvāḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyadhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti tebhyas tathāiva dharmaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:403_2_2: deśayiṣyati dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:403_2_3: vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:404_0_0: so 'nekavividhayā ṛddhyā samanvāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā buddhān
S06psp_6-8u:404_0_1: bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyati kuśalamūlāny
S06psp_6-8u:404_0_2: avaropya tad eva punar buddhakṣetram āgamiṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:404_2: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
S06psp_6-8u:405_2: dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:406_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:407_0: sa imābhir abhijñābhir nihṛtābhir yaṃ yam evākāṅkṣiṣyaty ātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahīṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:407_1: na ca tena sukhena vā duḥkhena vā sumanā vā durmanā vā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:407_3: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte buddhanirmitaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:407_4: na ca tena sukhena vā duṣkhena vā lipyate.
S06psp_6-8u:408_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratābhijñābhir vikrīḍitavyam evaṃ vikrīḍaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati sattvān paripācayiṣyati.
S06psp_6-8u:409_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paripāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_6-8u:409_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti hi subhūte aṅgahānir asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksamodhau.
S06psp_6-8u:410_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:410_1: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_6-8u:411_0: evam ukte bhāgavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:411_1: sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni.
S06psp_6-8u:412_0: subhūtir āha: te punar bhagavan katame kuśalā dharmā yaiḥ kuśalaiḥ dharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_6-8u:412_1: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:412_2: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra ca yāvikalpanā yad dānaṃ na jānātīdaṃ dānaṃ yasyārthe dātavyaṃ yena dātavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:412_3: te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06psp_6-8u:412_4: yayā pāramitayātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:412_5: 140) mārgaḥ, yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca.
S06psp_6-8u:412_6: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā kuśalā dharmās tatra ca yāvikalpanā,
S06psp_6-8u:412_7: yat prajñāṃ na jānātīyaṃ prajñā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_6-8u:412_8: te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yayā prajñāpāramitayā,
S06psp_6-8u:412_9: ātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:412_10: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca.
S06psp_6-8u:413_0: evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_6-8u:413_2_1: pañcābhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_6-8u:413_2_2: buddhadharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalā dharmās teṣu cāvikalpanā yad buddhadharmān
S06psp_6-8u:413_2_3: na jānātīme buddhadharmā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyās te cāsya trayo
S06psp_6-8u:413_2_4: vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yair buddhadharmair ātmanā ca tarati
S06psp_6-8u:413_2_5: sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasyānuttarāyai
S06psp_6-8u:413_3: yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti ca tariṣyanti ca,
S06psp_6-8u:413_4: yāvantaḥ subhūte kecid bodhaye mārgās tān kuśalān dharmān bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrya sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:414_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:415_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:415_1: yat punar āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_6-8u:415_2: yadīme dharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāḥ punaḥ katame? eta eva subhūte buddhadharmā yad (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:415_3: 141) ebhir dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbudhyate tasya sarvākārajñatāprāptasya sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiḥ prahīyate,
S06psp_6-8u:415_4_0: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhisaṃbudhyate tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:415_4_1: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ viśeso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_6-8u:415_5: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte anya eva pratipannako 'nyaḥ phalasthaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:415_6: na ca tāv ubhāv api nāgrapudgalau,
S06psp_6-8u:415_7: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattva ānantaryamārgapratipannakas tathāgataḥ punar arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anāvaraṇajñānaprāptaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:415_8: ayaṃ subhūte viśeṣo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya.
S06psp_6-8u:416_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:416_1_0: yadi bhagavann ime dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās tat kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:416_1_1: viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate? ayaṃ nairayiko 'yaṃ tairyagyoniko 'yaṃ yāmalaukiko
S06psp_6-8u:416_1_2: 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ gotrabhūmir ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy
S06psp_6-8u:416_1_3: ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan
S06psp_6-8u:416_2: yathaiva bhagavann ime pudgalā nopalabhyante tathāiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:416_3: yathaiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate tathāiva vipāko nopalabhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:417_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṇtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:417_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, yathā vadasi svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma na vipāka upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:417_2: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvā nābhijānanti te karmābhisaṃkurvanti duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vānāsravaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:417_3: te duścaritena karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti,
S06psp_6-8u:417_4: narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā,
S06psp_6-8u:417_8_0: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran, vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran, dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:417_8_1: caran, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran, upāyapāramitāyāṃ caran, praṇidhānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_6-8u:417_8_2: balapāramitāyāṃ caran, jñānapāramitāyāṃ caran, adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:142) caran,
S06psp_6-8u:417_13: pañcasv abhijñāsu caran, daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu caran,
S06psp_6-8u:417_15: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu caran, catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu caran,
S06psp_6-8u:417_16_0: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracārīmān bodhisattvadharmān utpādayati
S06psp_6-8u:417_16_1: yānutpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'nutttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_6-8u:417_18: yenārthena kṛtena na punar vipraṇasyanti yena vipraṇāśeṇa pañcagatike saṃsāre prapateyuḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:418_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:418_1: kiṃ punar bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:420_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavatā kṛṣṇāṃ vā śuklaṃ vā karmopalabdham?
S06psp_6-8u:422_0: subhūtir āha: yadi nopalabdhaṃ kuto narakas tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ prajñapto devamanuṣyāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:423_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti?
S06psp_6-8u:425_0: bhagavān āha: yadi subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
S06psp_6-8u:425_1: na bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhetānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthitvā na sattvān mocayet,
S06psp_6-8u:425_4: 143) sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmāṃs te 'jñatā na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt,
S06psp_6-8u:425_5: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike śrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_6-8u:425_6_0: ime dharmās tathā na saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭhās te sattvā asato
S06psp_6-8u:425_6_1: 'saṃvidyamānāṃ dharmān svayam eva vikalpayanty upalabhante vāsattve sattvasaṃjñino
S06psp_6-8u:425_9: asaṃvidyamānānāṃ viparyāse 'viparyastacittāḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca karmābhisaṃskurvanti,
S06psp_6-8u:425_11: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caran sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ carati,
S06psp_6-8u:425_12: yayā caryayā carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_6-8u:426_0_0: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya duṣkhañ ca duṣkhasamudayaṃ ca duṣkhanirodhañ
S06psp_6-8u:426_0_1: ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīñ ca pratipadam ākhyāti deśayati prakāśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati
S06psp_6-8u:426_1: eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarvāntargatāḥ kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmā yair bodhipākṣikair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_6-8u:426_3: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
S06psp_6-8u:427_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:427_2: atha duṣkhena parinirvānti? utāho samudayajñānena parinirvānti,
S06psp_6-8u:427_5: atha nirodhena parinirvānti? utāho mārgajñānena parinirvānti,
S06psp_6-8u:428_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:428_1: na subhūte duṣkhajñānena parinirvānti na duṣkhena,
S06psp_6-8u:428_5: yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
S06psp_6-8u:428_6: na punar duḥkhena parinirvānti na duṣkhajñānena,
S06psp_6-8u:429_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamā bhagavan caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā?
S06psp_6-8u:430_0: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte na duṣkhan na duṣkhajñānaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:430_4_0: api tu khalu subhūte yā eṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā dharmatā
S06psp_6-8u:430_4_1: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā yasyotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
S06psp_6-8u:430_4_2: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmādhātur yāsaṃpramoṣadharmatāyai
S06psp_6-8u:430_5: tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:431_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:431_1: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
S06psp_6-8u:431_4: yathā pratipadyamāno na śrāvakabhūmiṃ patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
S06psp_6-8u:432_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:432_2: tathā ca paśyati yathā na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,
S06psp_6-8u:432_4: satyaparyāpannāṃ (PSP_6-8:145) vā asatyaparyāpannāṃ vā taṃ sarve śunyā iti paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_5: sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_6: tasya gotrabhūmau sthitasya na mūrdhavinipāto bhavati yena mūrdhavinipātena śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patet,
S06psp_6-8u:432_7: sa iha gotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_9: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti,
S06psp_6-8u:432_11: sa duḥkhañ ca parijānāti na ca duṣkhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_12: samudayañ ca prajahāti na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_13: nirodhañ ca sākṣātkaroti na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_14: mārgañ ca bhāvayati na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati,
S06psp_6-8u:432_15: anyatra bodhinimnena cittena bodhipraveśena bodhiprāgbhāreṇa cittena sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati.
S06psp_6-8u:433_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati?
S06psp_6-8u:435_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmān śūnyān paśyati?
S06psp_6-8u:436_0: bhagavān āha: yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:436_1: yo 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:436_2: na ca kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_6-8u:437_0: subhūtir āha: evaṃ sati bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvā bodhiḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:438_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad, yathā vadasi, abhāvasvabhāvā subhūte bodhiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:438_1: sā na buddhena kṛtā na pratyekabuddhena nārhatā nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ya iha samādhau caranty anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_6-8u:438_2: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_6-8u:439_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:439_1: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tadā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:439_2_0: 146) śikṣitukāmena rūpe kathaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne
S06psp_6-8u:439_2_1: kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? cakṣurāyatane śrotrāyatane ghrāṇāyatane jihvāyatane kāyāyatane
S06psp_6-8u:439_2_2: manaāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? rūpāyatane śabdāyatane gandhāyatane rasāyatane spraṣṭavyāyatane
S06psp_6-8u:439_2_3: dharmāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? cakṣurdhātau rūpadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātau,
S06psp_6-8u:439_7_0: manodhātau dharmadhātau manovijñānadhātau kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? cakṣuḥsaṃsparśāyatane

S06psp_6-8u:470_1: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam idaṃ vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ sadravyatām upādāya sadravyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ no tu svatantravṛttitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:470_2: yad dharmatā rūpaṃ tan naivādravyaṃ sadravyaṃ paramārthaprabhāvitaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:470_3: (PSP_6-8:153) yā maitreya parikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye parikalpitā buddhadharmā ime 'dravyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:470_4: yā vikalpitā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye vikalpitā buddhadharmā ime vikalpitasadravyatām upādāya sadravyā draṣṭavyā no tu svatantravṛttitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:470_5: yā maitreya dharmatā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad ye maitreya dharmatā buddhadharmās te naivādravyā na sadravyāḥ paramārthena prabhāvitā draṣṭavyāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:471_0: maitreya āha: yad uktaṃ bhagavan bhagavatādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity,
S06psp_6-8u:471_1: advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā iti tad evaṃ rūpaprabhedaprajñaptau satyām,
S06psp_6-8u:471_2: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmaprabhedaprajñaptau satyāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:471_3_0: kiṃ saṃdhāya nirdiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā
S06psp_6-8u:471_3_1: gaṇanā kṛtā yad uta vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti yāvad buddhadharmā
S06psp_6-8u:472_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya yā parikalpite rūpe 'dravyatā rūpaṃ vā tan na veti.
S06psp_6-8u:474_0: [bhagavān āha:] yā punas tatra nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāramātratā rūpam ity api nu tad rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:476_0: [bhagavān āha:] tad anena maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:476_1: yat parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ tan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yat punā rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:476_2: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:476_3: tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya yā vikalpitasya rūpasya sadravyatā api nu tad rūpaṃ yad upādāya nāmasaṃjñāprajñaptivyavahāro bhavati rūpam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:478_0: [bhagavān āha:] tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya yā nimittena parikalpitena rūpeṇa parikalpitasya rūpasya tat svabhāvatāsallakṣaṇatāpi nu tad (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:480_0: [bhagavān āha:] tad anena te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:480_1: yad vikalpitaṃ rūpam api na rūpan nārūpaṃ yat punar na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam,
S06psp_6-8u:480_2: idañ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti.
S06psp_6-8u:480_3: tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya yā dharmatā rūpasya nairātmyaprabhāvitatāpi nu tad rūpam.
S06psp_6-8u:482_0: [bhagavān āha:] yā punas tathāivaṃ dharmatā rūpasya rūpadharmatā api nu tad rūpam?
S06psp_6-8u:484_0: [bhagavān āha:] tad anena maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:484_1_0: yad dharmatā rūpam api na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ yan na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ tad advayam idaṃ ca
S06psp_6-8u:484_1_1: saṃdhāyoktaṃ mayādvayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā yad idaṃ rūpam iti vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu
S06psp_6-8u:485_0_0: maitreya āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpa
S06psp_6-8u:485_0_1: evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasya vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne yāvad buddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_6-8u:485_0_2: evam advayalakṣaṇakuśalasyāntadvayaṃ varjayitvā madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipannasya,
S06psp_6-8u:485_1: kathaṃ lakṣaṇaparijñā? kathaṃ lakṣaṇaprahāṇaṃ? kathaṃ lakṣaṇasākṣātkriyā? kathaṃ lakṣaṇabhāvanā draṣṭravyā?
S06psp_6-8u:486_0: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreya carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntadvayaṃ varjayitvā madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipannasya,
S06psp_6-8u:486_1: rūpasya yan na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:486_2: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na parijñānaṃ nāparijñānam iyam evāsya parijñā,
S06psp_6-8u:486_3: yad rūpasya (PSP_6-8:155) na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:486_4: yad vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na prahāṇaṃ nāprahāṇam idam evāsya prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:486_5: yā rūpasya na sākṣātkriyā nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā,
S06psp_6-8u:486_6_0: yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ na sākṣātkriyā
S06psp_6-8u:486_6_1: nāsākṣātkriyā iyam evāsya sākṣātkriyā rūpaprahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā
S06psp_6-8u:486_7: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya na mārgasya bhāvanā nābhāvanā iyam evāsya bhāvanā.
S06psp_6-8u:487_0: maitreya āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyābhāvanāsamanvāgatasya katamaṃ nirvāṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:488_0: bhagavān āha: gambhīraṃ maitreya paramagambhīraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirvāṇam.
S06psp_6-8u:489_0: maitreya āha: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ gambhīraṃ paramagambhīraṃ nirvāṇam?
S06psp_6-8u:490_0: bhagavān āha: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ maitreya nirvāṇaṃ yan nirvāṇaṃ nānirvāṇaṃ tena gambhīraṃ paramagambhīram ity ucyate.
S06psp_6-8u:491_0: maitreya āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ na nirvāṇaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:491_1: bhagavān āha: parārthaṃ maitreyārabhya saṃsārāparityāgo na nirvāṇam,
S06psp_6-8u:492_0_0: maitreya āha: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parārtham ārabhya saṃsāraṃ na
S06psp_6-8u:492_0_1: parityajati saṃsārāt parityāgāt katham anena nirvāṇaṃ na parityaktaṃ bhavati? saced
S06psp_6-8u:492_0_2: bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmārtham ārabhya nirvāṇaṃ na parityajati nirvāṇāparityāgāt
S06psp_6-8u:492_0_3: katham anena saṃsāro na parityakto bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:493_0: bhagavān āha: iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saṃsāram api saṃsārato na vikalpayati,
S06psp_6-8u:493_3: 156) yad uta saṃsāraś ca nirvāṇaś ca.
S06psp_6-8u:493_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa yathā saṃsāraṃ saṃsārato 'vikalpayan saṃsārān nodvijati,
S06psp_6-8u:493_5: tathāiva nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇato 'vikalpayan nirvāṇato nodvijaty evam avikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitasyānayā yuktyā na saṃsāraparityāgo na nirvāṇaparityāgo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:494_0_0: maitreya āha: na nu bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvikalpadhātupratiṣṭhitena
S06psp_6-8u:494_0_1: saṃsāro yathaiva na tyaktas tathā nādattaḥ katham atyakto bhavati? nirvāṇaṃ yathā
S06psp_6-8u:494_0_2: na tyaktaṃ tathā nādattaṃ kathaṃ atyaktaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:495_0: bhagavān āha: nāhaṃ maitreya saṃsārasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:495_1_0: nirvāṇasyaivam ādānaṃ vānādānaṃ vā vadāmy api tu maitreya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato
S06psp_6-8u:495_1_3: upādāyāhaṃ parinirvṛtāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃsārasyāparityāgaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:496_0: maitreya āha: avikalpanāyā bhagavan kathaṃ samastalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam?
S06psp_6-8u:497_0_0: bhagavān āha: yac ca maitreya rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac
S06psp_6-8u:497_0_1: ca vijñānaṃ yāvad ye ca buddhadharmā yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā yā ca vedanāyā yā ca saṃjñāyā
S06psp_6-8u:497_0_2: yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yā ca vijñānasya yā ca yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
S06psp_6-8u:497_1: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ tasyāś ca śūnyatāyā yā bhāvābhāvādvayatā yā cāprapañcanā idaṃ maitreya avikalpanāyāḥ samastalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:498_0: maitreya āha: kiṃ nu bhagavan sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇām ekāṃśenaikāṃśikī nirvāṇapratiṣṭhā bhavati?
S06psp_6-8u:499_0: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ maitreya, tat kasya hetoḥ? hi nānādhātuko 'yaṃ maitreya loko 'nekadhātukas tasmiṃś ca nānādhātukeṣu bhūtāḥ sattvagotraprabhṛtaya upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:499_2: 157) yādita eva praṇītaṃ viśesaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati,
S06psp_6-8u:499_3: asti sā gotrajātir yādita evaṃ hīṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati tenaiva ca saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:499_4: asti sā gotrajātir yādita eva hīnaviśeṣaṃ prārthayate hīnam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati na ca tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
S06psp_6-8u:499_5: tata uttari praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayate praṇītam eva viśeṣam adhigacchati.
S06psp_6-8u:500_0: maitreya āha: yo bhagavaṃs tṛtīyaḥ sattvo gotrabhūmiḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:500_1: so 'rhattvaṃ prāpyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhiprārthayamāno 'nupapadyamānaś ca kathaṃ prāpnoty upapattiś cāsya bhagavatā pratipattau ca na vyākṛtā?
S06psp_6-8u:501_0: bhagavān āha: no 'haṃ maitreya karmakleśavaśena tasyopapattiṃ prajñāpayāmi,
S06psp_6-8u:501_1: api tv acintyān nirvāṇapāragāminīm arhato 'py upapattiṃ prajñāpayāmi.
S06psp_6-8u:502_0: maitreya āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad udārāśayā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā māhātmyādhyāśayāś ca,
S06psp_6-8u:502_1: yatredānīm ādita eva praṇītaṃ viśeṣaṃ prārthayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:502_3: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām udārāśayatā? katamā ca māhātmyādhyāśayatā?
S06psp_6-8u:503_0: bhagavān āha: yan maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakratvalokapālatvacakravartitvasarvākāralokasaṃpattibhir anarthino 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_6-8u:503_1: tāsu ca niḥsaṃgatā niravagrahatā ceyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām udārāśayatā.
S06psp_6-8u:503_2: tat punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tad asaktisukham anavagrahasukhaṃ nirvṛttisukhaṃ ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇam icchanto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:503_3: yad uta saṃsārāparityāgatayā iyam eṣāṃ māhātmyādhyāśayatā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_6-8u:504_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:504_3: āścaryān adbhutān bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvadharmān anuprāptukāmenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam.
S06psp_6-8u:505_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:505_1_0: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair
S06psp_6-8u:505_1_1: nārhadbhir nānāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir na srotaāpannair nāpi tair bodhisattvair
S06psp_6-8u:505_1_2: mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtās tat kuta eṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate?
S06psp_6-8u:505_1_3: ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime mānuṣyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:505_2: anena karmaṇā nairayikā anena karmaṇā tiryagyonikā anena karmaṇā yāmalaukikā anena karmaṇā manuṣyāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:505_8: anena karmaṇā aspṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:505_9: anena karmaṇā ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattayo vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattaya ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattayo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:505_10: anena karmaṇā srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho,
S06psp_6-8u:505_12: 'nena karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhāvasya hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā narakaṃ vā gacchacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:505_13: tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā kāmadhātuṃ vā rūpadhātuṃ vā ārūpyadhātuṃ vā gacchet,
S06psp_6-8u:505_14: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā prāpsyati,
S06psp_6-8u:506_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:506_1: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
S06psp_6-8u:506_2: abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:506_3: bālapṛthagjanā hi subhūte yāvad āryadharmeṣv akovidās te abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_6-8u:506_4: te viparyāsasamutthitair vikalpair vividhāni karmāṇy upasthāpayanti,
S06psp_6-8u:506_6: yadi vā nairayikā yadi vā tairyagyonikā yadi vā yāmalaukikā yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā kāmadhātuṣu deveṣu yadi vā rūpadhātukeṣu (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:506_7: 159) deveṣu yadi vā ārūpyadhātukeṣu deveṣu yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:506_9: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha: yaḥ srotāapannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārgajñatāyāṃ carati tathāgato vā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
S06psp_6-8u:506_10_0: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte nābhāvo mārgo nābhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalan nābhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalan
S06psp_6-8u:506_10_1: nābhāvo 'nāgāmiphalan nābhāvo 'rhattvan nābhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir nābhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_6-8u:507_0: subhūtir āha: abhāvo bhagavan mārgo 'bhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhattvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_6-8u:508_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_6-8u:510_0_0: bhagavān āha: iti hi subhūte yaś cābhāvo yaś ca mārgaḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā
S06psp_6-8u:510_0_1: na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tat subhūte
S06psp_6-8u:510_0_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena ye sattvāś caturbhir
S06psp_6-8u:510_0_3: viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāḥ pañcasu skandheṣv anitye nityasaṃjñino 'nātmany ātmasaṃjñino
S06psp_6-8u:510_0_4: duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñino 'śubhe śubhasaṃjñmo bhāveṣv abhiniviṣṭās tāṃs tān bhāvebhyo
S06psp_6-8u:511_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:511_1_0: asti bhagavan avastu bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ tathatāvitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā

S06psp_6-8u:557_1: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati, yāṃ kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati, yad vīryam ārabhate, yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati, tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo na punar ātmārtham.
S06psp_6-8u:558_0_0: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyasya kṛtaśo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhate
S06psp_6-8u:558_0_1: 'nyatra sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvo na sattve sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:558_1: 168) ātmasaṃjñāyāṃ sthitā, na jīve jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ sthitā,
S06psp_6-8u:558_14: yatra pratiṣṭhitānām ete samudācāro na pravartante,
S06psp_6-8u:558_15: ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā poṣasaṃjñā puruṣasaṃjñā pudgalasaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā kārakasaṃjñā vedakasaṃjñā jānakasaṃjñā paśyakasaṃjñā,
S06psp_6-8u:558_16: sa sarvān imān nimiñjitasaṃmiñjitavispanditaprapañcitān vivecyānyatamānyatamena cetasā bahulam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_6-8u:558_17_0: anena subhūte upāyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann ātmanā na
S06psp_6-8u:558_17_1: keṣucid dharmeṣv abhiniviśate sarvasattvāṃś cānabhiniveśe pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāreṇa
S06psp_6-8u:559_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:559_1: yo bhagavaṃs tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ kiṃ punaḥ sa dharmo lokavyavahāreṇābhisaṃbuddho 'rthaparamārthena?
S06psp_6-8u:560_0: bhagavān āha: lokavyavahāreṇa subhūte vyavahriyate 'yaṃ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho 'nena dharmeṇāyaṃ dharmo 'saṃbuddho 'yaṃ tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
S06psp_6-8u:560_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? upalaṃbho hy eṣo 'nena dharmeṇāyaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti,
S06psp_6-8u:560_3: na ca dvayena kācit prāptir nābhisamayaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:561_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:561_1: yadi bhagavan na dvayenābhisamayaḥ kiṃ punar advayenābhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:562_1: eṣa evātrābhisamayo yatra na dvayaṃ nādvayaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:562_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? prapañca eṣa yo 'yam eṣām abhisamayo na ca dharmasamatāyāṃ prapañco 'sti (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:563_0: subhūtir āha: abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kā samatā?
S06psp_6-8u:564_0: bhagavān āha: eṣaivātra samatā yatra na bhāvo 'bhāvo vā kīrtito,
S06psp_6-8u:564_1: na ca dharmasamatā parikīrtya tena cānyo 'pi dharma upalabhyate dharmasamatāyāṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:564_3: agatir aviṣayo dharmasamatā yasya kasyacid bālapṛthagjanasya vāryasya vā.
S06psp_6-8u:565_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmasamatā tathāgatasyāpy aviṣayaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:566_0_0: bhagavān āha: aviṣayaḥ subhūte sarvāryāṇāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā dharmānusāriṇāṃ vāṣṭamakānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:566_0_1: vā srotaāpannānāṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vānāgāmināṃ vārhatāṃ vā śrāvakāṇāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:566_0_2: vā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā tathāgatasyāpy aviṣayaḥ sarvadharmasamatā.
S06psp_6-8u:567_0: subhūtir āha: na punar bhagavan sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavartī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:568_0: bhagavān āha: syāt subhūte sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavartī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:568_1: yady anyā dharmasamatā syād anyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho,
S06psp_6-8u:568_2_0: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanānāṃ dharmasamatā yā ca śraddhānusāriṇo dharmānusāriṇo 'ṣṭamakāṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:568_2_1: srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:568_3: yā ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samatā samataiva samatā,
S06psp_6-8u:568_4_0: yā ca bālapṛthagjanasamatā, yā cāryasamatā, ekaivaiṣā samatā, ekasamatāyāṃ na dvayam
S06psp_6-8u:568_4_1: asti, ayaṃ bālapṛthagjano 'yaṃ śraddhānusāry ayaṃ dharmānusāry ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:568_4_2: srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo
S06psp_6-8u:568_5: sarva ete subhūte dharmāḥ samatāyāṃ nopalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:568_6_0: ime bālapṛthagjanāḥ, ayaṃ śraddhānusārī, ayaṃ dharmānusārī, ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotāapanno
S06psp_6-8u:568_6_1: 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_6-8u:569_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:569_2: ayaṃ dharmānusārī, ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:569_3_0: aviśeṣo vā bhagavan bhaviṣyati bālapṛthagjanānāñ ca śraddhānusāriṇāṃ ca dharmānusāriṇāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:569_3_1: cāṣṭamakānāñ ca srotaāpannānāṃ ca sakṛdāgāmināñ cānāgāmināñ cārhatāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāñ
S06psp_6-8u:569_3_2: ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāñ ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ca.
S06psp_6-8u:570_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, aviśeṣo dharmasamatāyāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:570_0_1: śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām
S06psp_6-8u:570_0_2: arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām.
S06psp_6-8u:571_0_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann aviśeṣo bālapṛthagjanānāṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām
S06psp_6-8u:571_0_1: aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:571_1: kuta eṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,

S06psp_6-8u:578_2: saiva bālapṛthagjanānāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā,

S06psp_6-8u:580_0: bhagavān āha: yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_6-8u:580_3: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānusāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:580_5: ya ime bhagavan vilakṣaṇā dharmās te katham ekalakṣaṇā vilakṣaṇānāñ ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā katham ekalakṣaṇā yukteti.
S06psp_6-8u:581_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yā rūpasya dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_1: kiṃ (PSP_6-8:175) na śūnyā sā, ya vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_2: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_3: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā pratītyasamutpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_4: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_5: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā laukikalokottarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_6: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_7: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_8: kiṃ na śūnyā sā, yā bālapṛthagjanānāṃ dharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:581_9: yā śraddhānusāridharmatā, yā dharmānusāridharmatā, yā aṣṭamakadharmatā yā srotaāpannadharmatā,
S06psp_6-8u:582_0: subhūtir āha: śūnyā sā bhagavan śūnyā sā sugata.
S06psp_6-8u:583_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte śūnyatāyāṃ vilakṣaṇā dharmā upalabhyante,
S06psp_6-8u:583_1: rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:583_5: laukikalokottarāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:583_7: bālapṛthagjanānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ śraddhānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:583_8: dharmānusāriṇāṃ vā lakṣaṇam aṣṭamakānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:583_9_0: srotaāpannānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam anāgāmināṃ vā lakṣaṇam arhatāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:583_9_1: vā lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vā lakṣaṇaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:585_0: bhagavān āha: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_6-8u:585_1: yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra pṛthagjanā nānyatra pṛthagjanebhyaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:585_8: na tatrārhan nānyatrārhataḥ, na tatra pratyekabuddho nānyatra pratyekabuddhān,
S06psp_6-8u:586_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:586_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan dharmatā saṃskṛtā utāho 'saṃskṛtā?
S06psp_6-8u:587_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:587_1: na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā, na ca saṃskṛtavyatirekeṇāsaṃskṛta upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:587_3_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yaś ca saṃskṛto dhātur yaś cāsaṃskṛto dhātur dvāv
S06psp_6-8u:587_3_1: apy etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau
S06psp_6-8u:587_4: tat punas tathāgato lokavyavahāreṇa vyavaharati na punaḥ paramārthena,
S06psp_6-8u:587_5: na ca paramārthe kaścit kāyasaṃskāre na vāksaṃskāre na manaḥsaṃskāre nānyatra kāyasaṃskārān nānyatra vāksaṃskārān nānyatra manaḥsaṃskārāt paramārtha upalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:587_6: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ samatā sa paramārthas tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthataś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:588_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tan na kasyacid dharmasya kaścid dharmaḥ kiṃcit karoti,
S06psp_6-8u:588_1_0: akiṃcitkareṣv akiṃcaneṣu niṣkiṃcaneṣu cādharmeṣu kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_6-8u:588_1_1: caran paramārthataś ca na calati sattvānāṃ ca kṛtyaṃ karoti dānena vā priyavadyatayā
S06psp_6-8u:589_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, yathā vācaṃ bhāṣase, yac chūnyatā akiṃcanā niṣkiṃcanā na kasyacit kiṃcit karoti kṛtyaṃ vā akṛtyaṃ vā,
S06psp_6-8u:589_1: yadi subhūte ete sattvāḥ svayam eva śūnyatāṃ jānīyur neyaṃ tathāgatasya vṛṣabhitā bhavet,
S06psp_6-8u:589_5_0: evaṃ sattvasaṃjñāyā vivecayati jīvasaṃjñāyā jantusaṃjñāyāḥ poṣasaṃjñāyāḥ puruṣasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:589_5_1: pudgalasaṃjñāyā manujasaṃjñāyā mānavasaṃjñāyāḥ kārakasaṃjñāyā vedakasaṃjñāyā jānakasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:589_7_0: saṃjñāsaṃjñāyā vivecayati, saṃskārasaṃjñāyā vivecayati, vijñānasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:589_7_1: cakṣuḥsaṃjñāyā vivecayati, śrotrasaṃjñāyā vivecayati, ghrāṇasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:589_7_2: jihvāsaṃjñāyā vivecayati, kāyasaṃjñāyā vivecayati, manaḥsaṃjñāyā vivecayati, cakṣurvijñānasaṃjñāyā
S06psp_6-8u:589_13: rūpasaṃjñāyā vivecayati, śabdasaṃjñāyā gandhasaṃjñāyā rasasaṃjñāyāḥ sparśasaṃjñāyā dharmasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:589_19: skandhasaṃjñāyā vivecayati, dhātusaṃjñāyā vivecayati, āyatanasaṃjñāyā vivecayati, pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāyā vivecayati,
S06psp_6-8u:589_22_0: avidyāsaṃjñāyā vivecayati, saṃskārasaṃjñāyā vijñānasaṃjñāyā nāmarūpasaṃjñāyā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:589_22_1: sparśasaṃjñāyā vedanāsaṃjñāyās tṛṣṇāsaṃjñāyā upādānasaṃjñāyā bhavasaṃjñāyā jātisaṃjñāyā
S06psp_6-8u:590_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kena bhagavan na saṃskṛto dhātuḥ śūnyaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:591_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:591_2: api tu khalu subhūte yan nirmito 'nyan nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti,
S06psp_6-8u:591_3: kaccit tasya tad vastv asti yan na śūnyatā?
S06psp_6-8u:592_0: subhūtir āha: no bhagavan nirmitasya hi bhagavan na kaccid vastv (PSP_6-8:
S06psp_6-8u:592_1: 178) asti yan na śūnyatā, ya ca śūnyatā yaś ca nirmitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:592_2: ubhāv etau dharmau, na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau dvāv etau śūnyatayā śūnyau,
S06psp_6-8u:592_3: tat kiṃ vinigūhitam iyaṃ śūnyatāyaṃ nirmitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:592_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tāv ubhāv api śūnyatāyān nopalabhyate,
S06psp_6-8u:593_0: bhagavān āha: nāsti subhūte rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yaś ca nirmito yā ca śūnyatā ubhayam etac chūnyatā.
S06psp_6-8u:594_0_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann ime laukikā dharmā nirmitā api nu ime lokottarā dharmā
S06psp_6-8u:594_0_1: nirmitāḥ? yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ
S06psp_6-8u:594_1: pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni,
S06psp_6-8u:594_2_3: daśabodhisattvabhūmayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_6-8u:594_3: yac ca teṣāṃ phalaṃ yena te pudgalāḥ prajñāpyante,
S06psp_6-8u:594_4_0: śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddho
S06psp_6-8u:594_4_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'pi nu bhagavann ime dharmā
S06psp_6-8u:595_0: bhagavān āha: yatra punaḥ sarvadharmā nirmitās tatra kaścic chrāvakanirmitaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:595_3: kaścit kleśanirmitaḥ, kaścit karmanirmito 'nena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitakopamā anānākaraṇāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:595_4_0: subhūtir āha: yat punar idaṃ bhagavan prahāṇaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_6-8u:595_4_1: vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā nirmitā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiprahāṇam
S06psp_6-8u:596_0: bhagavān āha: ye kecit subhūte dharmā utpāditā vā nirodhitā vā sarva ete nirmitāḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:597_0: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitakaḥ?
S06psp_6-8u:598_0: bhagavān āha: yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa dharmo na nimitaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:599_0: subhūtir āha: sa punaḥ katamo bhagavan?
S06psp_6-8u:601_0: subhūtir āha: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati,
S06psp_6-8u:601_1: na ca dvaye nopalabhyate, na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyas tasmād bhagavan saṃmoṣadharmo nirmitako bhavet.
S06psp_6-8u:602_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvena śūnyās
S06psp_6-8u:602_0_1: te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā na bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā
S06psp_6-8u:603_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:603_1: ādikarmiko bhagavan pudgalaḥ katham avavaditavyaḥ? katham anuśāsitavyo yat svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ parijānīyāt?
S06psp_6-8u:604_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_6-8u:604_1: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvo bhaviṣyati? nātra subhūte bhāvo nābhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:606_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanaso maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:606_1: āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtir āyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś cānandaḥ,
S06psp_6-8u:606_2: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti.
S06psp_6-8u:607_0: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāni prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ dharmakāyādhikāraḥ śikṣāparivarto nāmāṣṭamaḥ samāpta iti
S06psp_6-8u:608_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat,
S06psp_6-8u:608_1: teṣāñ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.
S06psp_6-8u:609_0: oṃ gate 2 pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā.
